L’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permettra d’améliorer les conditions alimentaires de sa famille et d’épargner de l’argent pour ses projets futurs. Son souhait est de pouvoir représenter la marque wooding  au Sénégal.
texts.en:
This borrowers’ group, named Gie Makarimal Akhlakh, was created on October 10, 2003 in Senegal. The term “Makarimal Akhlakh” denotes a person has a good heart and does the right thing. Since 2009, the number of group members has reached 300. The goal is to unify group members helping them with their work:  farming, fishing, general retail, import/export, transportation, industry, crafts, construction, animal husbandry, mining, [fishing], arts and culture, printing and woodwork, public services, sales, processing seafood and produce, retailing spare parts, ice cream production, bakeries and providing various services. The GIE also aims to foster friendship and solidarity among its members so as to help them acquire the material and financial means necessary for their businesses and to take advantage of the benefits afforded by GIE. It is in this spirit that an agreement has been signed between GIE and UIMCEC, to benefit GIE members at the national level. The launching phase uses a sample of 120 active members divided into 12 groups with 10 people in each.

Makarimal Akhlakh-group 2  is composed of 10 GIE members who are in the same line of business. They are represented by Mrs.  Henriette, who is the one raising the hand in the photo.   She is married and has been working as a vendor for 20 years. She sells traditional colorful “pagnes” cloth and incense. The revenues brought in by her business allow her to contribute to everyday household expenses.   She is a member of one of the UIMCEC branches and is seeking a credit to stock up large quantities of goods and grow her business. The growth of her revenue will allow her to improve her family’s nutrition and to save money for future projects.  She would like to  become a sales representative of the Wooding cloth brand in Senegal.

loans.use: ACHAT DE PAGNES ET D ENCENS A REVENDRE

loans.name: German Atilio

texts.es:
German, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, el cuál desea invertir en su trabajo agrícola, conprándose los insumos como el abono, insecticidas, pesticidas que son utilizados normalmente por los agricultores para prevenir en las siembras las plagas y la maleza, ya que éstas impiden la buena producción de cultivo.

El préstamo anterior manifiesta que se compro lo necesario para trabajar en la agricultura, dándole buenos resultados, su condición y circunstancias familiares manifiesta que están mejorando.
texts.en:
German has decided to request a new loan. He wants to invest his farm work, so he plans to buy supplies such as compost, insecticides, and pesticides. These supplies are normally used by farmers to protect their crops from pests and diseases that could inhibit good production.

With his previous loan, German says he bought what he needed for his farm work. He achieved good results and his family’s condition and circumstances improved.

loans.use: to buy compost, insecticides, and pesticides.

loans.name: Vusi

texts.en:
Vusi is applying for a loan to support his studies for a year at the Maharishi Institute. This is his story:

My name is Vusimuzi (Vusi) and I am 23 years old. I am pursuing a Bachelor of Business Administration at the Maharishi Institute right now. I am from Tembisa, and I'm the first in my family to attend university. My father passed away in May 2010 and no one is at work in our family; my mother is the one who supports the family with state unemployment benefits. In my spare time, I like to read books and play soccer. 

After graduation I plan to study further and obtain an MBA, and get a good starting salary in my dream career. Eventually I'd like to have my own consulting business. I want to make sure I can live a better life with my family. Education, for me, is the key to success; it makes me succeed in our ever-changing world. Through my education here, I learn new things and develop new skills, which I enjoy very much.

video.title: Kiva Borrower Vusi from South Africa

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul is applying for a loan to support his studies for a year at the Maharishi Institute. This is his story:

My name is Paul and I am studying for my Bachelor of Business Administration at the Maharishi Institute in Johannesburg. I live with my parents and six of my sisters in Bertrams, east of Johannesburg. In my family there are currently two people at work, my brother and my father. My mother volunteers at a hospital. 

Two of my siblings were able to attend university, but three others were not able to do so because of financial problems. My dream after graduating is to be a successful businessman; I would like to establish my own profitable recycling company, a clothing company, or produce solar panels. I want to do something that will make my family and the Maharishi Institute proud.  

In my spare time I enjoy reading, watching TV, and skateboarding with my friends. I look forward to receiving the support of this Kiva loan because it will help me achieve my educational goals, and equip me with what I need to make my dreams come true.

video.title: Kiva Borrower Paul from South Africa

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Ainusa

texts.ru: Айнусе 64 года.  Айнуса с 1985 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы в 2,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Айнусы имеется 3 дойные коровы, 25 овец, 1,2 га земли с кукурузой и картофелем, ежемесячная прибыль составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Доходы позволили Айнусе купить подержанную машину советского производства для бизнеса. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Айнуса обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дойных коров в целях увеличения доходов от продажи молока и молочной продукции. Доходы Айнуса планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en: Ainusa is 64 years old. She has been raising livestock and growing produce since 1985, having launched this business with a starting capital of 2,000 KGS. At present, Ainusa’s farm includes three dairy cows, 25 sheep, and 1.2 ha [about 3 acres] of land used for planting corn and potatoes. Her monthly revenues are about 10,000 KGS. Ainusa’s revenues have made it possible for her to buy an old, USSR-manufactured car for her business. In order to grow her business further, Ainusa turned to “Bai Tushum & Partners” for a loan in the amount of 80,000 intended for the purchase of dairy cows in order to increase her revenues from selling milk and dairy products. Ainusa plans to reinvest her revenues in a further expansion of her farm.

loans.use: to purchase cattle.

loans.name: Hopewell

texts.en:
Hopewell is applying for a loan to support his studies for a year at the Maharishi Institute. This is his story:

My name is Hopewell, I'm 22 and I am studying for a Bachelor of Business Administration in Johannesburg. I am the first in my family to attend university. I live with my parents, my three siblings and my extended family; my mother took in her sister's children and raised them as her own. In my spare time I like to DJ, watch movies, play soccer and video games.

After graduation, I'd like to obtain an MBA and also a BSc degree in Biotechnology. Then, I hope to get a good job and take care of my family. I hope also to motivate young people about education and help them further their studies. Education is important to me because it teaches me about life and gives me knowledge. It is also important because it is a pathway to fulfilling the dreams of my future and life.

video.title: Kiva Borrower Hopewell from South Africa

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn, a married 51-year-old mother of five, resides in Bobongan Ramon Magsaysay where she has been operating a fish-vending business to earn a living for two years now, each month earning about PHP 8,000. 

 In 2011, Marilyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. Now requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase additional fish to sell, she hopes to improve her business in the future.

loans.use: to purchase additional fish to sell.

loans.name: 04.12.9 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Luyến operates a food stall/restaurant selling snacks. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make processed food to sell.

Luyến is 53 years old and she is married with two children. Luyến is the group leader of the 12.9 Nam Ngạn solidarity group, which consists of four members. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, a urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent; another child is grown up.

This is Luyến's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Luyến has been involved in this business for three years. The main hardship that Luyến faces in her business is the lack of capital.

Luyến hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make processed food to sell.

loans.name: Miguelena

texts.en:
Miguelena is married with four children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Miguelena is 42 years old and all her children are in school.

Miguelena has a pedicab business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy an additional pedicab.

Miguelena has been in this business for four years. In the future, Miguelena would like to save enough so she continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy an additional pedicab.

loans.name: Jasmin

texts.en:
Jasmin is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.

Jasmin has been in this business for 8 years. She earns more income from food vending.

Jasmin has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell.

loans.name: Ysabel Catalina

texts.es:
Ysabel Catalina tiene 34 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos. Vive en El Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Esta Ventanilla se llama VRC SAN FRANCISCO DE SIBIMBE, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Sibimbe, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta  ventanilla tiene 20socio los cuales se dedican a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembran maíz y arroz.

Ysabel Catalina se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul. Las compras y ventas las realiza en Ventanas cada 15 días.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, urea, insecticidas. Con el apoyo del crédito podrá realizar la siembra. El sueño es comprar un terreno grande.

En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Ysabel Catalina is 34 years old and married. She lives with her husband and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The Communal Bank “San Francisco de Sibimbe” is located in the neighborhood of Recinto Sibimbe in the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank has 20 members who engage in short-cycle farming. They grow corn and rice.

Ysabel Catalina is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. Her purchases and sales are conducted in Ventanas every 15 days. She is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, urea, and insecticides. With the help of this loan, she will be able to grow her crops. Her dream is to buy a large piece of land.

In her free time, Ysabel Catalina enjoys playing volleyball.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, urea, and insecticides.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is from Tagulalo, Aurora. She is 66 years old, married, and has three children. To make a living, Lydia owns and operates a manufacturing business. Lydia has been engaged in her business for 12 years and earns 8,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2008, Lydia joined GDMPC. 

Lydia is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to purchase raw materials to manufacture new products and to pay for labor costs. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve her family's general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials to manufacture new products and to pay for labor costs

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en:
Lucia is 41 years old and married with five children.  With two children in school, Lucia works very hard to provide for them.

Lucia runs a sari-sari (variety) store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell. She has been in this business for 7 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, shampoo and other grocery items. 

In the future Lucia would like to save enough to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell.

loans.name: Melissa

texts.en:
Melissa works hard to support her family. She is married and has a egg business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF to buy more eggs to sell. She has been in this business for 5 years.

In the future, Melissa would like to save enough to expand her business and repair her family home.

loans.use: to buy more eggs to sell.

loans.name: Wendy Vanessa

texts.es:
Wendy, se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, ella vive con su padre y los tres hermanos, además es madre soltera de un niño, el negocio de ella es la venta de ropa usada y lo inició por ideas propias, además la necesidad de tener ingresos para apoyar a su familia.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de tres fardos de ropa, mas los gastos de transporte en que incurra, esta compra le ayudara a tener más disponibilidad en el inventario y a variar los estilos, ya que esto podrá ofrecer a los clientes y agradar gustos y necesidades.

La aspiración de ella es desarrollarse en el comercio, ampliando más el negocio para ser más rentable y poder mejorar las ganancias.
texts.en:
Wendy makes a living selling used clothing. She lives with her father and three siblings, and she is also a single mother of one boy. Her business is the sale of used clothing, which she began on her own out of the necessity to have an income to support her family.

She is requesting a loan for the purchase of three bales of clothing, plus the transportation costs that she incurs. This purchase will help her to have a greater availability of inventory and variety of styles that she can offer this to her customers, appealing to their tastes and needs. 

Wendy's aspiration is to develop her sales skills, growing her business so that it is more profitable, and to be able to improve her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase three bales of used clothing.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is 50 years old, married and has 9 children. Cristina works very hard to provide for them.

Cristina runs a sari-sari Store in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 8 years and sells a variety of items such as snack food, noodles and other groceries.   Cristina requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy more items to sell.

In the future Cristina would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: buy items to sell

loans.name: Omar Augusto

texts.es:
El señor Omar y su esposa Katy ya han tenido créditos en KIVA el cual pagaran puntual y fue para el mejoramiento de su casa.
Esta nuevamente solicitando un préstamo ya que tiene los gastos escolares de sus hijos y necesita pagar la colegiatura para que puedan iniciar este ciclo escolar y comprar los útiles escolares, no tengan ningún problema para seguir con sus estudios y tengan un futuro mejor.
El señor Omar trabaja en una compañía de contrición y la señora Katy trabaja en limpieza de una casa particular, con el ingreso del señor Omar será para pagar el crédito, ya que la señora Katy, se encargara de los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Omar and his wife Katy have had loans from KIVA which they have paid off punctually and used to improve their home.

He is requesting a new loan as he has school expenses to pay for his children and needs to pay the school so that they can attend this academic year and buy back-to-school supplies and have nothing get in the way of them continuing their studies and having a better future.

Omar works for a company and Katy cleans in a private house, Omar's income will be used to pay for the loan and Katy will take care of the household expenses.

loans.use: to pay for school expenses

loans.name: Merlinda

texts.en:
Merlinda is 60 years old and married with 8 children.  Merlinda works very hard to provide for them.

Merlinda runs a sari-sari Store in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 8 years and sells a variety of items such as sugar, soap and other groceries.  Merlinda requested a PHP 13000 loan through NWTF to purchase more items to sell.

In the future Merlinda would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: purchase more items to sell

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en:
Amelita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a photocopying business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 10 years.  She also earns more income from a general store.

Amelita is borrowing PHP 29000 through NWTF to purchase additional materials and supplies for her photocopying business.

Amelita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF.  She dreams to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: buy supplies for her photocopying business

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is 46 years old, married and has 2 children.  She works hard to provide for her family. 

Betty runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has been running the general store for 6 years and also earns an income from livestock.

Betty requested a PHP 12000 loan through NWTF to buy more stocks to sell in her general store.  She has borrowed and repaid 5 loans from NWTF before this loan.  Betty aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Elilibeth

texts.en:
Elilibeth is 28 years old and married with 2 children.  She works hard to provide for her family. 

Elilibeth runs a general store in the Philippines.   She has been running the general store for 6 years and also earns an income from food vending.

Elilibeth requested a PHP 27000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. in her general store.  She has borrowed and repaid 12 loans from NWTF before this loan. 

Elilibeth aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: buy items to sell in her general store

loans.name: Rosa Emilia

texts.es:
Rosa, vive con su familia, es madre soltera de tres hijos, se dedica a la venta de semilla de marañón, éste lo aprendió con su esposo con quien actualmente ya no tiene relación, ella le dio continuidad  al negocio viendo la manera de poder proveer a su familia los ingresos y cubrir necesidades.
Solicita préstamo para comprar dulces artesanales y semilla de marañon cruda, su intención es diversificar el negocio ofreciendo a sus clientes además de la semilla azada también los dulces artesanales, esto le ayudará a incrementar las ventas.

Su objetivo es comprarse enseres para el hogar, a futuro lograr mejorar la condición económica de su familia, tener un negocio movil con un vehículo donde transportar la mercadería.
texts.en:
Rosa lives with her family. She's a single mother of three and earns a living selling cashew nuts. She learned this business with her husband with whom she is no longer has a relationship. She kept up the business seeing in it the way to be able to provide income and cover necessities for her family. 

She is seeking a loan to purchase traditional sweets and raw cashew nuts. Her intention is to diversify the business offering her customers traditional sweets in addition to the roasted nuts. This will help her increase her sales. 

Her goal is to purchase household equipment and in the future to improve the financial shape of her family, and to have a mobile business with a vehicle with which to transport the merchandise.

loans.use: to purchase traditional sweets and raw cashew nuts.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 48 years old and married with 3 children.  She earns a living by farming flowers in the Philippines.  Gemma has been farming flowers for one year and also earns additional income from food vending.

Gemma is borrowing PHP 10000 through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.  She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and farm supplies

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
As a married parent of 2 children, Geraldine works hard to support her family.  She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from general store.  

Geraldine is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her food vending business.

Geraldine has been sustaining her business activities through her past 11 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: buy ingredients for her food vending business

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
As a married parent of 5 children, Merly works hard to support her family.  She has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming sugarcane.  

Merly is borrowing PHP 16000 through NWTF to buy spare parts for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

Merly has been sustaining her business activities through her past 9 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: buy spare parts for her motorcycle

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business renting computer games in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 4 years and also earns more income from tobacco retailing, videoke machine rental and raising pigs.

Nenita is borrowing PHP 20000 through NWTF to buy another computer for her computer games rental business.

Nenita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams to repair and renovate her family home in the future.

loans.use: buy a computer for her business

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en:
Marilyn lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur.  She is 35 years of age and a mother of 4 dependents.  She manages a private transportation service.  It has existed for 8 years. She earns about PHP 8,000 a month. 

By joining GDMPC last 2011, Marilyn able to borrow PHP 15,000 from said cooperative. The money will be used to purchase vehicle spare parts and accessories. She hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: buy vehicle spare parts and accessories

loans.name: Jovita

texts.en:
Jovita is 54 years old and married with 6 children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Jovita is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Jovita has been raising pigs for 12 years and also earns additional income from raising chickens.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Nadja

texts.ru: Надя-молодая женщина 41года.  Она  мать двоих дочерей, замужем.  Сама Надя домохозяйка,её муж Айди занимается частными работами, он сантехник, мастер на все руки.  Также старшая дочка находится за пределами города на заработках и поддерживает бюджет семьи.  Конечно этих доходов не хватают накопить на непредвиденные расходы и поэтому Надя обратилась в нашу организацию за финансовой поддержкой.  Ей необходимо отремонтировать крышу дома, в которой живет, так как она на последнем этаже и в осенний период в дождливую погоду очень сильно протекает. Это стоит больших расходов и она вынуждена брать кредит.  Она рада, что с помощью таких организаций люди нуждающиеся в финансовой поддержке могут осуществить свои планы.
texts.en: Nadja is a young 41 year-old woman.  She is a married mother of two daughters.  Nadja is a homemaker, and her husband, Aidi, is involved in private contract work - he is a plumber and a master of all trades.  Their oldest daughter works outside the city limits and supports the family budget.  Of course, these earnings are not sufficient to save for unexpected expenses, and this is why Nadja came to our organization for financial support.  She needs to repair her house roof because she lives on the top floor, and the roof leaks a lot in rainy weather in the autumn.  This repair cost a lot of money, and she needs to obtain a loan.  She is glad that people, who need financial support, can achieve their plans with the help of such organizations.

loans.use: to repair her house roof

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia is 56 years old and married with 4 children. She works very hard to provide for them.

Cecilia runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy goods for her general store business.

Cecilia has been in this business for 13 years and sells a variety of items such as bread, soft drinks, noodles, soap, etc. 

In the future Cecilia would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy goods for her general store business

loans.name: Rizalina

texts.en:
Rizalina is 58 years old and a widow with three children. She lives in Mahayahay, Aurora. 

She owns and operates a business venture, selling a variety of vegetables to earn a living, and she's been six years in this business. Each month, she earns PHP 6,000 doing this type of business. She requested a loan of PHP 10,000 to purchase additional vegetables to sell. 

In 2009, Rizalina joined GDMPC. Positively, she simply hopes for the business to improve.

loans.use: to purchase additional vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Lorenza Del Carmen

texts.es: Lorenza, de 51años de edad, originaria de la comarca las Canoas, Teustepe, se dedica a la venta de refrescos, cuajadas y ropa usada. Este negocio lo inicio hace 18 años al fallecer su esposo , ella asumió el papel de jefe de familia siendo padre y madre de sus hijos, haciéndose cargo de los gastos del hogar y la educación de sus hijos. Comenzó a vender refrescos naturales y cuajadas hechas por ella misma, ofreciendo de casa en casa . Fue conociendo clientes quienes le hacían sugerencia que productos sería bueno que vendieran y los cuales son de mucha necesidad. La ropa usada es uno de los artículos que más le demandan las amas de casa de las comunidades en donde ella vende, sobre todo porque este tipo de ropas es más barato, las colchas y las sabanas son parte de los artículos que mas vende. Es por esto que requiere el crédito para comprar ropa usada, colchas y sabanas. Pues su meta es lograr vender más variedad de productos y crecer como comerciante y hacer su negocio sostenible económicamente.
texts.en:
Lorenza, 51, originates from the region of Canoas, Teustepe. She sells drinks, curds and used clothing. 

She started this business 18 years ago when her husband died, she took on the role of head of the family, being both father and mother to her children, taking care of the household expenses and her children's education.

She began selling drinks and curds, which she made herself, by going from house to house. It was meeting her customers that taught her what products would sell well and which were in the greatest demand. 

Used clothes are among the most requested by housewives in the communities where she sells her products, above all because this type of clothing is the cheapest, the quilts and sheets are also among her best selling items. 

This is why she requires a loan to buy used clothes, quilts and sheets. It is her goal to be able to sell a greater variety of products and grow as a sales woman, making her business economically sustainable.

loans.use: to buy used clothes, quilts and sheets.

loans.name: Jose Ilario

texts.es: José Ilario de  49 años de edad, casado con 5 hijos de los cuales uno está bajo su responsabilidad, los otros son independiente económicamente. Vive en Villa Nueva, un lugar que se caracteriza por la pesca y la siembra. Ahí José Ilario tiene un taller de carpintería desde hace  26 años donde se elaboran y se dan mantenimiento a muebles de madera para una posterior venta por encargo. Antes de iniciar el negocio trabajaba en un taller donde aprendió el oficio de carpintería de esa forma surgió la idea de iniciar su propio negocio. El objetivo del préstamo es comprar madera pero sus sueños es comprar maquinas industriales para obtener mayores ingresos y dar un mejor servicio al cliente.
texts.en:
José Ilario, 49, is married with five children of whom one is under his care; the others are financially independent. He lives in Villa Nueva, a place characterized by fishing and crop farming. There José Ilario has a woodworking shop where for 26 years he has built and refurbished wooden furniture for sale to order. 

Before starting the business he worked at a shop where he learned the carpentry trade and so got the idea of starting his own business. The goal of the loan is to purchase lumber but his dreams are to buy industrial machinery in order to bring in more income and provide better customer service.

loans.use: to stock his woodworking shop with lumber.

loans.name: Romelie

texts.en:
As a married parent of 5 children, Romelie works hard to support her family. She has a business buying and selling frozen products in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from livestock and food vending. Romelie is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to purchase additional stocks to sell for her  frozen products business.

Romelie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 17 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock to sell

loans.name: 04.8.4 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Len works in agriculture, farming food. She is requesting a loan to purchase rice seedlings to grow for future sale.

Len is 41 years old and she is married with 3 children. She is the group leader of the 04.8.4 Nam NGạn solidarity group, which consists of 3 members.  She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with no dependents; her children are grown up.

In 2008, Len joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her  business. She has successfully repaid 5 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Len has been involved in this business for 7 years. The main hardship that Len faces in her business is lack of capital.

With her business profit, Len hopes for her children to find a good job, for her business to do well, and to build a new house.

loans.use: to purchase rice seedlings to grow for future sale.

loans.name: Josefa

texts.en:
Josefa is 44 years old and single. She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Josefa requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Josefa has been raising pigs for 8 years now and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Josefa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Randy

texts.en: Randy is married with one child. He is 26 years old and lives in Balide, Aurora. Randy is operating a retail store, selling a variety of products to local community member to earn a living. He has been doing this for three years and every month he earns 5,000 PHP from this work. He has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee. In 2011, Randy joined GDMPC. Randy hopes to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar and coffee

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is from Lubid, Aurora, Zamboanga Del Sur. She is 41 years old. She is married and has four children. 

To make a living, Gemma buys and sells delicacies in the local community. She has been engaged in her business for four years and earns PHP 3,000 a month for these activities. 

In 2007, Gemma joined GDMPC. She is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000, which will be used to buy more food items to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy more food items to sell.

loans.name: Pelegia

texts.en:
For over three years in Acad, Aurora, Pelegia, a 52-year-old married mother of six children, has made a living through the operation of a sari-sari store. She sells a variety of food and home-use products. She earns 4,000 PHP a month for these activities.

In 2008, Pelegia joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. She is now requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase new items such as candies, Milo (malted milk), shampoo, soaps, etc. 

She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the loan as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to purchase new items such as candies, Milo, shampoo, soaps, etc.

loans.name: Blanca Zoila

texts.es:
Blanca, vive en casa propia con su esposo y una hija de 18 años, administra el negocio en la venta de pupusas y también la tienda de productos domésticos, estos negocios los tiene desde hace ocho años y trabaja todos los días de la semana.

Ella solicita un préstamo para comprarse productos como el arroz, azúcar, frijoles, maíz, aceite, entre otros que pueden ser necesarios y que con este préstamo logrará obtener para mejorar el inventario del negocio y aumentar las posibilidades de ventas.

Su objetivo es a través del préstamo tiner mayor demanda con los clientes, ofreciéndoles productos de calidad para mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Blanca lives in her own house with her husband and 18-year-old daughter. 

She runs a business which sells pupusas as well as household goods. She has had these businesses for 8 years and she works every day of the week. 

She is requesting a loan to purchase goods such as rice, sugar, beans, maize, oil, and other items that may be necessary. 

With this loan she will help her improve the store inventory and increase the possibility of sales. Her objective is, with the loan, to have greater demand with her customers, offering them quality goods to increase her revenue.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, maize, and oil.

loans.name: Hector Genaro

texts.es:
HECTOR TIENE 48 AÑOS DE EDAD ES CASADO CON LA ESPOSA Y CON CON LOS HIJOS VIVEN EN LA CUIDAD DE VENTANAS PROVINCIA DE LOS RIOS.

LA VENTANILLA EL LAUREL SE ENCUENTRAS UBICADA EN EL RECINTO EL ALUREL DE LA PARROQUIA ZAPOTAL NUEVO PERTENECIENTE AL CANTON VENTANAS SE DEDICA A LABORES AGRICOLAS

HECTOR SE DEDICA A LA AGRICULTURA A LA SIEMBRA DE MAIZ, ARROZ Y FREJOL ADEMAS A LA CRIANZA DE GALLINAS Y CERDOS, CON CREDITO LE AYUDADO A INVERTIR EN SEMILLAS, ABONOS, Y FERTILIZANTES PARA LOS CULTIVOS Y EN BALANCEADO PARA LOS ANIMALES.  EL CREDITO ES DE GRAN AYUDA PARA AUMENTAR LA PRODUCCION.

EL SUEÑO ES MEJORAR LOS CULTIVOS PARA TENER MAS PRODUCION PARA TENER UN MEJOR NIVEL DE VIDA.

LE GUSTA HACER DEPORTE Y DESCANZAR.
texts.en:
Hector is 48 years old and is married. He and his wife and children live in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Rios.

The El Laurel communal bank is located in the precinct of El Laurel in the parish of Zapotal Nuevo, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. They make their livings doing agricultural work.

Hector works in agriculture, growing corn, rice, and beans. He also raises hens and pigs. The loan has helped him to invest in seeds, compost, and fertilizers for his crops and in a balanced feed for the animals. The loan is a great help in increasing his production.

His dream is to improve his crops to have greater yield so he can have a better quality of life.

He likes to play sports and rest.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, compost, and fertilizer for his crops and feed for his animals.

loans.name: Jose Alejandro

texts.es:
Jose, administra una tienda pequeña de productos de primera necesidad, y vive con su esposa y su hija, que son los únicos que dependen económicamente de él, su negocio nació para atraer ingreso a la familia administrando un negocio donde se ofrecen  productos de primera necesidad.

Solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de mercadería para aumentar el negocio abasteciendolo de boquitas, cereales, juegos, aceite y condimentos, esta compra ayudará a ampliar la variedad a los clientes y mejorar las oportunidades de venta.

Su objetivo es mejorar cada vez más el negocio y al mismo tiempo reparar la vivienda con las utilidades que pueda obtener.
texts.en:
Jose runs a small shop selling basic staples and lives with his wife and daughter who are the only ones who depend on him financially. His business was born out of a desire to attract income to the family running a business where basic staples are sold. 

He is seeking a loan to invest in the purchase of merchandise in order to expand the business, stocking it with snacks, cereal, juices, oil and condiments. This purchase will help him increase variety for the customers and improve his sales opportunities. 

His objective is to continually improve the business and at the same time to fix up his living quarters with the profits he may obtain.

loans.use: to purchase snacks, cereal, juices, oil and condiments.

loans.name: Sergey

texts.ru:
49 летний Сергей женат и у него две дочери. Старшей дочери 19 лет  и она учится на третьем курсе Капанского Политехнического института на  финансово-экономическом факультете с оплатой обучения в размере 352.000 драм в год. Младшей дочери 17 лет, и в этом году она поступила на первый курс Капанского Политехнического института на металлургический факультет с оплатой обучения в размере 354.000 драм в год. 
Сергею необходим кредит на сумму 180.000 драм для оплаты учебы младшей дочери в первом семестре. 
Сергей родился в Капане, окончил Капанский  строительный техникум. В данный момент он работает на горно-обогатительном комбинате водителем погрузчика, а в свободное от работы время занимается перевозкой пассажиров на своем собственном автомобиле. Жена Сергея домохозяйка. Данный кредит является четвертым по счету, получаемым Сергеем от организации Нор Оризон и он всегда выплачивает кредит вовремя.
texts.en:
49 year-old Sergey is married and has two daughters.  The oldest daughter is 19 years old, and she is a third-year finance-economics department student at the Kapan Polytechnic Institute with an annual education cost of 352,000 dram.  The youngest daughter is 17 years old and got accepted to the metallurgical department of the Kapan Polytechnic Institute with an annual education cost of 354,000 dram.  Sergey needs a loan in the amount of 180,000 dram to pay for his youngest daughter's first semester of studies.  
Sergey was born in Kapan and graduated from the Kapan construction college.  Currently, he works as a driver at an ore-producing facility and is involved in passenger transportation on his own car in his free time.  His wife is a homemaker.  This is Sergey's fourth loan from the Nor Horizon organization, and he always repays his loans on-time.

loans.use: to pay for his youngest daughter's first semester education

loans.name: 04.3.2 Nam Ngạn Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Liên operates a food stall/restaurant selling snacks. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make the processed food to sell. Liên has been involved in this business for seven years. The main hardship that Liên faces in her business is lack of capital.

Liên is 50 years old and she is married with one child. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province, with one dependent.

In 2007, Liên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid five loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Liên is the group leader of the 04.3.2 Nam Ngan solidarity group, which consists of five members. 

With her business profit, Liên hopes to build a new house, for her business to do well, and for her child to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make the processed food to sell.

loans.name: Dildorakhon

texts.ru: Дилдорахон 30 лет, замужем, воспитывает 4 детей. Дилдорахон с 2002 года занимается торговлей женской обувью на рынке города Узген, начав этот бизнес с 3,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду и настойчивости Дилдорахон, ежемесячная прибыль в бизнесе составляет около 10,000 сом (KGS). Товар Дилдорахон сама отбирает и привозит с оптового рынка для последующей реализации. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Дилдорахон обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 75,000 сом (KGS) на расширение ассортимента за счет осенней обуви. Доходы Дилдорахон планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Dildorakhon is 30 years old, married and raising four children.  She has been involved in sales of women's shoes at the Uzgen city market since 2002, having started this business with 3,000 som (KGS).  Thanks to Dildorakhon's hard work and persistence, her monthly business profit now amounts to about 10,000 som (KGS).  She selects the merchandise herself and brings it from a wholesale market for subsequent resale.  In order to further develop her business, Dildorakhon requested a loan in the amount of 75,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to expand her merchandise selection through autumn shoes.  She plans to invest the earnings into a continued business growth.

loans.use: to expand her merchandise selection through autumn shoes

loans.name: Luis Rodrigo

texts.es:
LUIS TIENE 37 AÑOS DE EDAD ES CASADO CON LA ESPOSA Y CON CON LOS HIJOS VIVEN EN LA CUIDAD DE VENTANAS PROVINCIA DE LOS RIOS.

LA VENTANILLA EL LAUREL SE ENCUENTRAS UBICADA EN EL RECINTO EL ALUREL DE LA PARROQUIA ZAPOTAL NUEVO PERTENECIENTE AL CANTON VENTANAS SE DEDICA A LABORES AGRICOLAS

LUIS SE DEDICA A LA AGRICULTURA A LA SIEMBRA DE MAIZ, ARROZ Y FREJOL ADEMAS A LA CRIANZA DE GALLINAS Y CERDOS, CON CREDITO LE AYUDADO A INVERTIR EN SEMILLAS, ABONOS, Y FERTILIZANTES PARA LOS CULTIVOS Y EN BALANCEADO PARA LOS ANIMALES.  EL CREDITO ES DE GRAN AYUDA PARA AUMENTAR LA PRODUCCION.

EL SUEÑO ES MEJORAR LOS CULTIVOS PARA TENER MAS PRODUCION PARA TENER UN MEJOR NIVEL DE VIDA.

LE GUSTA HACER DEPORTE CON LA FAMILIA.
texts.en:
Luis, 37, lives with his wife and children in the city of Ventanas in the Rios province.

Ventanilla is found in the precint of Laurel in the parish of Zapotal Nuevo which belongs to the Ventanas district, an agricultural area.

Luis works in agriculture, he grows corn, rice and beans as well as raising chickens and pigs. 

The loans will help him to invest in seeds, manure and fertilizers for the crops and balanced feed for the animals. The loan is a great help for increasing production.

His dream is to improve the crops to achieve a greater yield and an improved quality of life.

He likes to play sport with his family.

loans.use: to buy manure and fertilizer for the crops and balanced feed for the animals

loans.name: Leydin Yadira

texts.es:
Leydin, es una mujer trabajadora a base de esfuerzo, ha logrado establecer un negocio de venta de ropa, aretes y pupusas, vive con su esposo y una hija de tres años de edad, el negocio lo inicio en casa donde reside, trabaja desde las 6:00 de la tarde hasta las 10 de la noche, en la venta de las pupusas, la venta de ropa le realiza durante el día.

Solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de sus productos por ejemplo aceite, condimentos, quesillo, frijoles, y también otra parte la invertida en Blusas y ropa interior, para poder darle continuidad al negocio, el préstamo será de gran ayuda el que le permitiera mejorar la disponibilidad de materia prima y la mercadería en la venta de ropa.

Su objetivo es a través del préstamo pueda realizar una buena inversion, proyectarse mejores ingresos a través de las ventas, continuar trabajando para lograr su expectativas familiares.
texts.en: Leydin is a hardworking woman who with effort has managed to establish a business selling clothing, earrings and pupusas. She lives with her husband and a three-year-old daughter. She began her business in the home where she resides and works from 6 p.m. until 10 p.m. selling pupusas. She sells clothing during the day. She is seeking a loan to invest in the purchase of materials for making her products such as, for example, oil, condiments, farmer's cheese and beans. Also she will invest another portion in blouses and underwear in order to keep up the business. The loan will be of great help as it will allow her to improve the availability of raw materials and merchandise for the clothing sales. Her objective is through the loan to be able to make a good investment, create better earnings through her sales, and continue working in order to achieve her family expectations.

loans.use: to purchase oil, condiments, farmer's cheese and beans, as well as blouses and underwear for her two businesses.

loans.name: Lucenda

texts.en:
Lucenda is 63 years old and married with four children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Lucenda is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase additional feed for her business.

Lucenda has been raising pigs for five years and earns additional income from her general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream of saving money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed for her pigs

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is from Villaflor, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. She is 46 years old and is married with three children. 

Irene cultivates mangoes for sale. She has been engaged in her business for nine years and earns PHP 25,000 a month. 

In 2009, Irene joined GDMPC. Irene is requesting a loan of PHP 50,000, which will be used to obtain farm chemicals. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to save as a reserve for future emergencies.

loans.use: to obtain farm chemicals.

loans.name: Bernabas

texts.en:
Bernabas is a 47-year-old married man. He has five children from his marriage to Imelda, a 40-year-old lady. The children are Juliet, 21, who is married; Kamelia, 19, who graduated from Senior high school; Renaldi, 10 and Jantoani, 8, who are both attending elementary school; and Rendi, who is one and a half years old.  

Bernabas covers his family’s living expenses by running a furniture business. He creates home furniture such as beds, chairs, tables, cupboards, etc but he mostly receives order to make windowsills and doorframes. The business is still categorized as a small business as Bernabas only has very limited capital to produce furniture. The limitation in business capital often drove Bernabas to refuse several orders from his customers. He then went to TLM and requested a loan of IDR 3,000,000 to buy wood. He is expecting that the availability of basic materials will enable him to raise his income in order to better cover his family's needs.

loans.use: To pay for more wood

loans.name: Ahmadali

texts.ru: Ахмадали житель города Истаравшан. Ему 35 лет. Он женат. У него четверо детей. Жена Ахмадали домохозяйка. Сам он занимается скотоводством. Этим видом деятельности он занимается десять лет. Ахмадали просит кредит для закупа бычков и телят.
texts.en: Ahmadali is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  He is 35 years old, married and has four children.  Ahmadali's wife is a homemaker.  He is involved in animal husbandry.  He has been in this business for ten years.  Ahmadali is requesting this loan to buy bulls and calves.

loans.use: to buy bulls and calves

loans.name: Ma. Delia

texts.en:
Ma. Delia, a 52-year-old married woman from Bohol, Philippines, sells fish and other seafood products to the people in her area. She buys from the fisherman and sells to the neighborhood.

Ma. Delia is a hardworking woman but lacks the capital to grow her business. She is therefore requesting a loan of PHP 10000 to buy more fish and other seafood products to sell. She will be able to cater to more customers as a result.

In the future, Ma. Delia dreams of improving her business and her family's standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more fish and other seafood products to resell.

loans.name: Shohida

texts.ru:
Шохида жительница города Истаравшан. Ей 25 лет. Он замужем. У нее один ребенок. Муж Шохиды уехал на заработки в Российскую Федерацию. Шохида зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этим видом деятельности она занимается десять лет. 
Шохида просит кредит для закупа крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Shohida is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  She is 25 years old, married and has one child.  Her husband left to work in the Russian Federation.  Shohida earns a living by breeding cattle.  She has been in this business for ten years.  Shohida is requesting this loan to buy cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Elva Melida

texts.es: Elva tiene 42 años de edad, es casada, tiene dos hijos, vive en el municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa. Ella tiene 6 años de dedicarse a la agricultura, cultiva yuca, maíz y frijoles. La producción la vende en el mercado local. Además ella realiza otra actividad de sastrería donde genera otros ingresos. El préstamo que solicita de 8,000 Lempiras lo invertirá en abonar sus cultivos con el fin de mejorar la producción y la calidad para facilitar la venta. Su meta es ampliar la producción, para obtener mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Elva, age 42, is married and has two children.  She lives in the Santa Cruz de Yojoa municipality. 

She has been farming for six years.  She grows yucca, corn, and beans.  She sells the production at the local market.  She also has another business activity.  She does tailoring, which generates other income.

She will use the requested loan for 8,000 lempiras to fertilize her crops.  She will do this to improve production and quality in order to facilitate sales.  Her goal is to increase production in order to get greater income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her yucca, corn, and bean crops.

loans.name: 04.3.1 Nam Ngan Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nhung operates a food stall/restaurant selling snacks. She is requesting a loan to purchase materials to make the processed food to sell. Nhung has been involved in this business for six years. The main hardship that Nhung faces in her business is lack of capital.

Nhung is 44 years old and she is married with four children. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province. She has no dependents, as her children are grown up.

In 2007, Nhung joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Nhung has successfully repaid five loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nhung is the group leader of the 04.3.1 Nam Ngan solidarity group, which consists of four members. 

With her business profit, Nhung hopes for her children to find good jobs, to travel for a vacation within the country, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase materials to make the processed food to sell.

loans.name: Ana Laura

texts.es:
La señora Ana solicita un préstamo para cubrir los gastos escolares que es el pago de la inscripción y la compra de los útiles de sus tres hijos, que cursaran el ciclo escolar de primaria y secundaria.
La señora Ana se dedica a la venta de ropa usada y nueva en su propio domicilio, y su esposo es chofer de un camión de carga, estos son los ingresos que tiene para la familia y con el ingreso que obtiene de su negocio de ropa y que su esposo con el sueldo de su trabaja se encargara de los gastos familiares. 
Quiere que sus hijos sean unos triunfadores y sabe para logarlo tiene que tener una buena educación y estudios.
texts.en:
Ms. Ana is seeking a loan to cover the school expenses which are the enrollment fees and purchasing of school supplies for her three children who attend elementary and secondary schools. 

Ms. Ana earns a living selling used and new clothing out of her own residence and her husband is a truck driver hauling loads. These are the sources of income for the family, and with the income she obtains from her clothing sales business, and that of her husband's salary from work, she will handle the family expenses. 

She wants her children to be winners and knows that to achieve it they must have a good education and schooling.

loans.use: to cover educational expenses for her three children.

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 59 years old, married and has eight children. 

Lorna has a pig-fattening business in the Philippines. Lorna requested a PHP 19,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional feed for her pig.

Lorna has been pig fattening for six years now and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Lorna would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additonal feed for her pig

loans.name: Nelson

texts.en: Nelson is married and has three children. Nelson is 53 years old and lives in Libertad, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. To make a living, Nelson owns and operates a tricycle transport business. Nelson has been engaged in his business for 13 years and earns 5,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2011, Nelson joined GDMPC. Nelson is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to repair his vehicle for better service. He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to repair his vehicle for better service.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.en:
Estrella is a merchant from Bohol, Philippines. She has been running a sari-sari or convenience store for more than seven years now. This is the source of her income.

Estrella works hard to earn a living. As of this time, she is in need of additional funds for her venture. She is asking for a loan of 12,000 PHP to buy more items to sell in her store such as washing detergents, shampoos, cooking ingredients, dry goods and other household items. With this loan, she will be able to sell more products, thus increasing her income. 

Estrella dreams of expanding her business and making it more sustainable.

loans.use: to buy more washing detergents, shampoos, cooking ingredients, dry goods, etc to sell

loans.name: Habibullo

texts.ru: Хабибулло житель города Истаравшан. Ему 25 лет. Он холост. Хабибулло живет с родителями. Его мать и отец занимаются растениеводством. Сам Хабибулло занимается скотоводством. Он разводит крупнорогатый скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Этим видом деятельности Хабибулло занимается три года. Он просит кредит для закупа бычков.
texts.en: Habibullo is a resident of the city of Istaravshan.  He is 25 years old, single and lives with his parents.  His mother and father are involved in agriculture.  Habibullo is involved in animal husbandry.  He breeds cattle for future sale.  He has been in this business for three years.  Habibullo is requesting this loan to buy bulls.

loans.use: to buy bulls

loans.name: Maqsud

texts.ru:
Максуд родился 1964 году в Истаравшане. Он живет с женой. У них четверо детей. Максуд зарабатывает путем разведения крупнорогатого скота. Этот вид деятельности является основным источником дохода его семьи, так как его жена не работает. Жена Максуда помогает ему в его деятельности.
Животноводством Максуд занимается более двадцати лет. Он просит кредит для закупа телят в дальнейшем для продажи.
texts.en: Maqsud was born in 1964 in Istaravshan.  He lives with his wife, and they have four children.  Maqsud earns a living by breeding cattle.  This business provides the primary source of income for his family because his wife does not work.  Maqsud's wife helps him with this business.  He has been involved in animal husbandry for over twenty years.  Maqsud is requesting this loan to buy calves for future resale.

loans.use: to buy calves for future resale

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling bananas in the Philippines. She has been in this business for six years and earns additional income from raising livestock.

Marites has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She is now borrowing 14,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional stock for her business of buying and selling bananas.

Marites dreams of saving enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock of bananas for resale.

loans.name: Melody

texts.en:
Melody, 35, is married with five children. She works hard to provide for her family, running a sari-sari store in the Philippines. She has now requested a loan of 19,000 PHP through NWTF to buy more items to sell in her sari-sari store.

Melody has been in this business for five years and has previously received funds through Kiva. She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Mercedes De La Concepcion

texts.es: Mercedes de la concepción  de  40 años de edad del municipio de Chinandega con dos hijos de 22 y  28 años de edad, tiene por actividad económica la venta de mercadería. Mercedes esta solicitando el financiamiento para hacer mejoras en  su casa las cuales consisten en reparar pared así como también repellar la pared y darle mantenimiento a las tuberías de agua. en la foto ella esta mostrando las paredes que quiere reparar y repellar Mejoras que he querido realizar desde que compro la casa pero por falta de recursos y oportunidades no la había podido hacer, este sueño lo he logrado gracias al apoyo que el programa kiva le brinda a las personas con escasos recursos para tener un lugar digno para vivir. Con el crédito comprara material de construcción como: bloques, cemento, arena, hierro, zinc entre otros.
texts.en:
Mercedes de la Concepción is forty years old with two children, 22 and 28 years old. She sells merchandise for a living. 

Mercedes is requesting a loan to make improvements on her house including repairing the wall, plastering it, and maintaining the water pipes. 

In the photograph, she is indicating the walls that she wants to repair and plaster. 

She wanted to complete these improvements since she bought the house, but because of a lack of resources and opportunities she was unable to do it. She has reached this dream thanks to the support Kiva gives people with few resources to have a decent place to live. 

With the loan she will purchase construction materials such as: construction blocks, cement, sand, iron, zinc as well as other things.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as: construction blocks, cement, sand, iron, zinc, and other things.

loans.name: Mujeres Unidas Group

texts.es:
El Comité Mujeres Unidas tiene 15 integrantes, ellas fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una en lo personal como laboral.
La Sra. Ignacia, presidenta del grupo tiene 29 años, y es una mujer muy emprendedora  y capaz de liderar un grupo numeroso como lo es este, durante todos estos ciclos ha demostrado ganas de superación. Ella se dedica a la venta de varias cosas, como alimentos no perecederos, productos de primera necesidad, etc. que se hacen indispensable para sus clientas así como para ella se hace indispensable generar mayores ingresos.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de mercaderías como lácteos, panificados, frutas, verduras, ropas, etc.
texts.en:
The Mujeres Unidas [United Women] communal bank has 15 members.  They established their main objective to be growing each day personally and in their work.

Ignacia, age 29, is the president of the group.  She is a very enterprising woman and a capable leader of a large group like this one.  During all of these cycles she has demonstrated the desire to succeed.

She sells various things like non-perishable food and basic needs products, etc. that are indispensable items for her customers.  In the same way, it is essential to her to generate greater income.

She is requesting the loan to buy merchandise like dairy products, baked goods, fruits, vegetables, and clothes, etc.

loans.use: to buy dairy products, baked goods, and clothes, etc.

loans.name: Ferlyn

texts.en:
Ferlyn is a 41-year-old married woman and a mother of two young children who are 6 and 4 years old. She is from Bohol, Philippines. She has been running a sari-sari or convenience store and an eatery for more than 12 years now.

Ferlyn joined CEVI to gain access to financial services offered by the organization. She is asking for a loan of 4,000 PHP to buy ingredients such as meat, vegetables, cooking oil and seasonings plus additional stocks for her store. Through this loan, Ferlyn will be able to make her business grow and become productive.

Ferlyn hopes to make her business a success and save for the future schooling of her children.

loans.use: to buy ingredients such as meat, vegetables, cooking oil, and seasonings plus additional stock for her store

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru:
Рано проживет в районе Дж. Руми. Она 44 - летняя замужняя женщина. У нее четверо детей. Рано трудолюбивая и очень добрая женщина. Сын Рано находится за рубежом. 
Рано занимается животноводством. Она разводит крупнорогатый скот у себя дома. Рано на протяжении четырех лет разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Она просит кредит для закупа бычков. За счет полученной прибыли Рано хочет отремонтировать свой дом.
texts.en: Rano lives in the J. Rumy district.  She is a 44 year-old married woman and has four children.  Rano is a hardworking and very kind woman.  Her son is currently abroad.  Rano is involved in animal husbandry.  She breeds cattle at home.  Rano has been breeding livestock for future sale for four years.  She is requesting this loan to buy bulls.  Rano wants to use the resulting profit to repair her house.

loans.use: to buy bulls

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Bushra is a 28-year-old hard working and independent woman who is living in Punjab, Pakistan with her three daughters. Her hobby is tailoring and her aim in life is to live a happy and healthy life with her family.

Bushra's husband is a laborer and his income is not enough to fulfill even the basic needs of his family. He doesn't want his wife to work but because of financial issues, she works very hard to generate some income from her tailoring business.  

Bushra has applied for a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan to purchase some sewing materials like threads, needles, buttons, scissors, clothing etc.  She hopes, with the help of this loan, she will reach her desired net income and be able to save for the future.

loans.use: To purchase sewing materials for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Firuza

texts.ru: Фируза проживает в Яванском районе. Ей 37 лет. Она разведена. Фируза одна воспитывает троих детей. Она на протяжении семи лет работает на рынке. Фируза арендует торговую, где занимается продажей женской и детской одежды. Она берет кредит для покупки детской одежды и женского нижнего белья.
texts.en: Firuza lives in the Yavan district.  She is 37 years old, divorced and raising three children.  Firuza has been working at a market for seven years.  She leases a retail outlet, where she sells women's and children's clothing.  She is requesting this loan to purchase children's clothing and women's undergarments.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing and women's undergarments

loans.name: Rasheeda

texts.en:
Rasheeda is a 31-year-old widow who is living with her five sons and a daughter in Punjab, Pakistan. Since 2010, she has been running a vegetable and fruit shop, which is the only source of income for her large family. Rasheeda's hobby is cooking and her biggest aim in life is to provide quality education to her all children.

Rasheeda has requested a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan for her vegetable and fruit shop. With the loan, she will buy a variety of vegetables and fruits for her shop, which will allow her to increase her monthly sales and income.

She is very hard working and an honest woman and is confident about her children's bright future.

Note: In the picture, Rasheeda is standing with one of her sons named Adil.

loans.use: To purchase a variety of vegetables and fruits for her shop.

loans.name: Nozigul

texts.ru: Нозигул родилась 1960 году в Яване. Она замужем. У нее трое детей. Ее муж находится на заработках. Сама Нозигул более пятнадцати лет занимается торговлей одежды. Она просит кредит для покупки детской одежды.
texts.en: Nozigul was born in 1960 in Yavan.  She is married and has three children.  Her husband is working abroad.  Nozigul has been involved in selling clothing for over fifteen years.  She is requesting this loan to purchase children's clothing.

loans.use: to purchase children's clothing

loans.name: Gerardo Oswaldo

texts.es:
Gerardo, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para realizar la compra de repuestos para mejorar las condiciones del vehículo (moto taxi), su gasto es la revisión del sistema eléctrico, cambio de aceite cambio y cambio de llantas, ya que esto le permitirá garantizar el buen servicio a los clientes.

Manifiesta que el préstamo anterior le ayudó a comprar repuestos para el equipo del vehículo, manteniéndolo hasta el momento en buenas condiciones, por eso cree necesario cada cierto periodo llevarlo a revisión con un mecánico ya que esto le dará mayor seguridad.
texts.en:
Gerardo has decided to request a new loan so that he can buy parts to improve the condition of his motorcycle taxi. His expenses include fixing the electrical system, changing the oil, and replacing the tires. These updates will guarantee that he can provide good service to his customers.

Gerardo says that his previous loan helped him to buy parts for his vehicle so that he could keep it in good condition. For this reason, he believes that it is necessary to take his vehicle to a mechanic for periodic tune-ups so that it will operate safely.

loans.use: to fix the electrical system, change the oil, and replace the tires on his motorcycle taxi.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Crisanta

texts.en:
Crisanta, 37, is a married woman from Bohol, Philippines who has been in the fishing business for more than three years. Her husband is a fisherman and she needs additional funds for their business.

She is asking for a loan of 8,000 PHP to buy a new fishing net and fuel for the fishing boat. This will help her husband in enhancing his daily catch.

In the future, Crisanta dreams of expanding their fishing business and making it a success.

loans.use: to buy a new fishing net and fuel for the fishing boat.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila, 45, is a widow with four children who resides in Balugo, Tambulig. She owns and operates farm land, planting and harvesting rice to sell to earn a living, a business she's been in for six years. Each month, she earns 6,000 PHP doing this type of business.

Leonila has requested a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She joined GDMPC in 2009. In the future, Leonila wants to make improvements to her house and to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure for her farming business.

loans.name: Emely

texts.en: Emely, 32 years old, is married with three children. She lives in Lapinig, Kapatagan, Lanao Del Norte. Emely raises pigs to sell to earn a living. She's been doing this for four years and every month she earns 5,000 PHP from this work. She has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase feed & other supplies. In 2010, Emely joined GDMPC. In the future, Emely hopes to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed & other supplies

loans.name: Duo El Socobal Group

texts.es: Dúo el socobal  en este dúo esta se encuentra integrada  doña Marta ella es originaria de Chimaltenango, tiene  5 hijos que están en edad escolar ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, está solicitando este crédito para la compra de maíz ya que necesita elaborar más para vender y generar más ganancias  para ayudar a su familia desde ya le agradece por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Marta is a member of this pair, "Dúo El Socobal." She is a native of Chimaltenango and she has five school-age children. She earns her living making and selling tortillas. 

Marta is requesting this loan for the purchase of corn, because she needs to make more tortillas to sell and generate more earnings to help her family now. She is grateful for the help offered.

loans.use: to purchase corn to make tortillas to sell.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria, 63, is a widow from Kapatagan, Lanao del Norte. To make a living, she manages a charcoal making business. She has been in her business for five years and earns 7,000 PHP a month from these activities.

In 2011, Maria joined GDMPC. She is now requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP which will be used to pay for labor costs in charcoal making. She plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to pay for labor costs in charcoal making.

loans.name: Daylinda

texts.en: Daylinda is from Balugo, Tambulig. She is 32 years old, married and has four children. To make a living, Daylinda raises pigs to sell. Daylinda has been in business for seven years and earns 5,000 PHP month. In 2008, Daylinda joined GDMPC. Daylinda is requesting a loan of 7,000 PHP to purchase  feed & other supplies. Daylinda plans to use the additional revenue to improve her general living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase feed & other supplies

loans.name: Elizbeth

texts.en:
Elizbeth is a 30-year-old housewife who is living with her husband in Punjab, Pakistan. Since 1997, her husband has been running a toy shop, which is the only source of income for them. 

Elizbeth has applied for a loan from KIVA partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to purchase more toys for his shop so that he can increase his sales and monthly income.

Elizbeth is very hopeful about her husband's business success as a result of this loan.

loans.use: To purchase more toys for her husband's toy shop.

loans.name: Belilia

texts.en: Belilia is a 59-year-old resident of Alegria, Aurora. For three years, she's been providing for her three children's needs from the little amount of 8,000 PHP she gains monthly from her own piggery business. However, in 2007 she became a member of GDMPC. She is applying for a loan at GDMPC for  10,000 PHP to buy feed and supplies. Belilia wants to expand her business one day.

loans.use: to buy feed and supplies

loans.name: Morad

texts.en:
Morad who appears in the picture, is a 20-year-old single young man. 

For the past four years, Morad has had a mobile phone store, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income to him, but also not enough to cover his cost of living.

Morad is requesting a 1,000 USD youth loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new collection of mobile phones and making some remodeling improvements to his store, such as painting and installing additional shelves. This will improve Morad's store condition and increase demand from his customers to choose and buy mobile phones, which will increase his income and offer to him better living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a new collection of mobile phones and make some remodeling improvements to his store.

loans.name: Jorge Alberto

texts.es:
El señor Jorge solicita un crédito para cubrir los gastos de inscripción, compra de útiles escolares y los uniformes de sus tres hijos que actualmente se encuentran cursando la primaria. 
El señor Jorge elabora para una compañía de materiales para construcción, como chofer del camión de entregas. Y su esposa Brenda trabaja en una maquiladora con este ingreso ayudara a su esposo con los gastos familiares, ya que el se encargara de los pagos del crédito con su ingreso.
Desea que sus hijos continúen estudiando para que se preparen para que sean unos triunfadores
texts.en:
Jorge is requesting a loan in order to cover enrollment costs and purchase school supplies and uniforms for his three children, who are currently in elementary school.

Jorge works for a construction material company as a delivery truck driver. His wife Brenda works in a factory and uses her income to help her husband with family expenses, since he will take care of the loan payments with his income.

He wants his children to stay in school and get an education so that they can become successful.

loans.use: to cover school expenses.

loans.name: Modesto

texts.en:
Modesto is a 41-year-old seaweed farmer from Talibon, Bohol, Philippines. He has eight children. Modesto has been in business for more than ten years. Seaweed, or Carrageenan commonly known as 'guzo", is one of the most promising food additive industries. It is produced from three kinds of seaweed, two of which are farmed extensively in the Philippines.

Modesto is in need of additional capital for his business. He is asking for a loan of PHP 11,000 to buy materials for seaweed farming, such as seedlings, nylon and rope. With this, Modesto will be able to produce more seaweed, thus augmenting his income. 

Modesto has dreamed of improving his business so that it will generate more income necessary for the family's needs and for the schooling of his children.

loans.use: to buy materials for seaweed farming, such as seedlings, nylon and rope.

loans.name: Glena

texts.en:
Glena is 35 years old and lives in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. She is married and the mother of four children. Glena raises pigs for sale to make a living. She has been engaged in this type of business for ten years. She earns a monthly income of 5,000 PHP from this work. 

Glena requested a loan of 7,000 PHP from GDMPC to purchase young livestock to raise and sell in the future. Glena been a member of GDMPC since 2010. In the future, Glena hopes to expand her business and earn more profit.

loans.use: to purchase young livestock to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Monette

texts.en: Monette is 31 years old and married with three children. She has a small farm and grows taro, taamu, ufi and bananas to earn a living. She has been doing this for many years. Monette has requested a loan to repair her home and improve her business. She has been a member of SPBD since 2011. With her profits, Monette hopes to expand her business and save more to help her children education.

loans.use: to buy bush knives, weed killer, seeds, and a shovel for her faming business.

loans.name: Ledis Maria

texts.es: Ledis se dedica  la venta de productos de belleza, entre amas de casa y trabajadoras informales, que son sus principales clientes, mediante guidas especializadas de productos  o catálogos, con los cuales promociona los productos que se encuentran   con descuentos especiales. Ella tiene 7 años de experiencia y con sus ingresos provenientes de este negocio, ha logrado apoyar a su familia, conformada por su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 8 a 27 años. Su negocio inició cuando una amiga la entusiasmó mostrándole las ventajas de la tarea comercial  de manera independiente. Los principales artículos de su oferta son los productos de belleza joyería y ropa, los cuales vende directamente a su consumidor final mediante financiamiento para que este le pague en plazos acordados teniendo en cuenta su capacidad de pago. Ledis sostiene relaciones comerciales con las diferentes  empresas que distribuyen sus productos mediante revistas y el sistema de multinivel. Las ventas las realiza a crédito y de contado, ocupándose de su negocio desde las 2 de la tarde hasta las 7 de la noche, mientras el resto del tiempo realiza tareas concernientes a su hogar. En la actualidad las ofertas de los catálogos traen muchos productos con descuentos especiales y su capacidad de compra es muy inferior a su potencial  de ventas y sueño de prosperidad; esta es la razón por la cual está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará perfumería, cosméticos, accesorios, femeninos y productos naturales,  nuevos pedidos  con los aumentaría sus utilidades y poco a poco empezaría a estructurar un almacén que es su meta a mediano plazo.
texts.en:
Ledis makes a living selling beauty products. The majority of her customers are housewives and informal workers. Her sales are based from specialized guides of products or catalogs, which promote products with discounts on certain items. She has 7 years of experience selling beauty products. With the income that comes from her business she has been able to support her family, which is made up of her husband and their three children who are between the ages of 8 and 27 years old. Her business started when a friend enthusiastically showed her the advantages of independent sales. 

The main items she offers are beauty products, jewelry and clothes, which she sells directly to the consumer, working with a financing system that allows her customers to make payments that take into consideration their financial ability. Ledis maintains relationships with the different suppliers that distribute her products through magazines and a multilevel sales system. She makes cash sales as well as sales on credit. Her business hours are 2pm to 7pm, the rest of her time is occupied by household chores. 

Currently the special offers that are available in the catalogs include many products with special discounts. Her working capital is not sufficient to buy the amount of products she needs to be able to meet her potential demand for sales and her dream of prosperity. This is the reason she has applied for a loan through Kiva. It is the first loan she has taken out through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. She will use the loan to buy perfumes, cosmetics, feminine accessories and natural products. With new orders she hopes to have increased profits and her medium range goal is to be able to slowly keep more stock in her store.

loans.use: to buy perfume, cosmetics, accessories and natural products for women.

loans.name: Sabeen

texts.en:
Sabeen is a 30-year-old hard working tailor living in Punjab, Pakistan, with her son and a daughter. Her husband is a shoe maker and she helps her husband in making shoes as well.
