She has requested a PHP 25,000 loan through NWTF to buy more stock to sell in her general store. Angeles has borrowed and repaid 29 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her general store for ten years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane and rice. Angeles aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more stock to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Indira Melissa

texts.es:
Indira Melissa tiene 22 años y nació en Cali, Colombia. Indira logró terminar su carrera en administración de empresas en la Universidad Pública del Valle gracias a que obtuvo una beca completa por el estado Colombiano debido a su excelencia académica y porque su familia tiene un nivel de ingresos muy bajo.  

Indira Melissa tiene el sueño de realizar una maestría en el Reino Unido y el apoyo de Kiva ayudaría a que Indira Melissa pueda pagar los cursos de preparación del TOEFL y la inscripción al examen. 

Una vez realice su maestría y regrese a Colombia, Indira Melissa quisiera dedicarse a  la investigación y docencia en una universidad pública donde pueda compartir los conocimientos adquiridos.

Aquí esta su historia:

Soy consciente que estudiar una Maestría en Gestión e Implementación de Proyectos de Desarrollo, en una de las mejores universidades del mundo, no podría tener una finalidad egoísta. Para mi es gratificante saber que es un sueño que no sólo es de beneficio propio sino que con la realización de éste, podré ser útil en mi región, en mi país, en la academia y sobretodo con los jóvenes del mañana. Esa es precisamente mi visión de futuro. Una realidad en la que el trabajo cobra sentido sólo cuando contribuye al bien común.

Ser una de las beneficiarias de Kiva sería resolver un obstáculo más de los muchos que ya he superado y de los que vendrán. Además, es ante todo un aliciente, una confirmación de que nada puede interponerse entre tu visión, tu sueño y tú. Porque de las pocas razones que quizás podrían barajarse para no hacer el posgrado, la falta de recursos económicos definitivamente es la última que aceptaría como barrera ante mi sueño. Esta no es más que mi firme convicción de esfuerzo, porque como bien lo dijo Gandhi “Nuestra recompensa se encuentra en el esfuerzo y no en el resultado. Un esfuerzo total es una victoria completa”.
texts.en:
Indira Melissa, age 22, was born in Cali, Colombia.  Indira managed to complete her degree in Business Administration at the Universidad Pública del Valle.  She did this thanks to a full scholarship that she got from the state of Colombia.  She received the scholarship because of her academic excellence and because her family has a very low level of income.

Indira Melissa's dream is to get a Master’s Degree in the United Kingdom.  The support from Kiva would help Indira Melissa be able to pay for the TOEFL preparation courses and the exam registration fees.

Once she gets her Master’s Degree and returns to Colombia, Indira Melissa would like to devote herself to research and teaching at a public university, where she would be able to share her acquired knowledge.

Here is her story:

I am aware that studying for a Master’s Degree in management and implementation of development projects in one of the best universities in the world cannot be for selfish reasons.  It is gratifying for me to know that this is a dream that is not only for my own benefit, but that by doing this I will be able to be useful to my region, to my country, in academia, and, above all, to tomorrow’s young people.  That is precisely my vision for the future.  It is a reality in which the work makes sense only when it contributes to the common good.

Being one of Kiva’s borrowers would resolve one more of the many obstacles that I have already overcome and those that will come.  Also, it is above all an incentive, a confirmation that nothing is able to come between your vision, your dream, and yourself.  

This is because, of the few reasons that could be considered for not completing the post graduate studies, the lack of financial resources is definitely the last that would be accepted as a roadblock to my dream.

This is no more than my firm conviction about effort.  As Gandhi said so well, “Our reward is found in the effort, not in the result.  A complete effort is a complete victory.”

loans.use: to help pay for the application expenses for studying for a Master's Degree in Implementing Development Projects.

loans.name: Llankachinapac De Urubamba Group

texts.es:
La socia Elsi tiene 37 años y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella es natural de la ciudad de Trujillo pero vive en la hermosa provincia de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. La socia Elsi es ama de casa pero también en sus horas libres se dedica administrar su cabina de internet, la socia Elsi se encuentra todos los días en su negocio desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Elsi requiere el préstamo para comprar discos, memorias, usb, tinta, papel y otras cosas más. (La socia Elsi en la fotografia esta levantando la mano). 

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “LLankachinapac de Urubamba” en la provincia de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de animales menores como gallinas y pollos, reparación de motos, servicio de internet, venta de comida de pollos, venta de abarrotes y otros brindan servicio de transportes.  

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
The member, Elsi, is 37 years old.  She lives in a common-law marriage and has two children.  She is a native of Trujillo but lives in the beautiful province of Urubamba, department of Cusco.  She is a housewife but also manages her internet café in her spare time.  She works in her business every day from 8:00 in the morning until 9:00 in the evening.  She has been engaged in this business for several years and it is going well.  At this time, Elsi is requesting the loan to purchase disks, memory, usb, ink, paper, and other items. (Elsi is raising her hand in the photograph).

This group is comprised of friends and neighbors that formed the “LLankachinapac de Urubamba” Communal Bank in the province of Urubamba, department of Cusco.  The communal bank is made up of people who are always looking for opportunities to get ahead and strive daily to provide their children with a better future.  The members’ business activities include selling small animals such as hens and chickens, motorcycle repair, internet services, chicken dinner sales, grocery sales, and transportation services.

The members are grateful for the opportunity provided and are committed to making their respective payments according to the established terms.

Cusco is located in the district and province of Cusco. The department of Cusco is in the heart of the ancient city of the Incas.  It is known as a tourist area because of its archeological centers, historic district, scenery, and history.  It is a charming city in the country’s “Región del Sur”.  Cusco also is well-known for its traditional “Inti Raymi” festival and because “Machupicchu”, one of the seven wonders of the world, is located here.

loans.use: to purchase disks, memory, usb, ink, paper, and other items.

loans.name: Amigos Emprendedores Group

texts.es:
La socia Bertha tiene 22 años y tiene una relación de unión libre pero esta embarazada y tiene seis meses de gestación, ella es natural de la ciudad de Ollantaytambo pero ahora vive en la ciudad hermosa del Cusco. La socia Bertha es una joven emprendedora y responsable que le gusta los restos pues tiene un puesto de venta de libros. Ya es un año que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Bertha requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo libros (La socia que Bertha está levantando la mano en la fotografía). 

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “Amigos Emprendedores” en la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de libros en su mayoría, venta de dulces y otros brindan servicio de taxi.  

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (Las personas que a perecen en la parte inferior de la fotografía llegaron tarde a la reunión del banco comunal). 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
One of the members of the group is 22-year old Bertha who is 6-months pregnant and is in a common-law relationship. She was born in the town of Ollyantaytambo but now lives in the beautiful city of Cusco. Bertha is a hardworking and responsible young woman who enjoys looking at archeological remains. She has run a bookstall for a year and the business is doing well. She is now in need of a loan to buy merchandise such as books (in the photo she is the one with her hand raised).

The name of this group is Amigos Emprendedores and is made up of neighbours and friends. They live in the province and department of Cusco. The members seek every opportunity they can to get ahead and make an effort every day to provide their children with a better future. They are involved in a variety of jobs such as selling books wholesale, selling candy, and driving a taxi. The members are grateful for this opportunity and promise to repay the loan according to the schedule. 

(The people in the foreground of the photo arrived late to the community bank’s meeting.)

Cusco is located in the province and department of Cusco and is in the heart of the ancient city of the Incas. It is known for its tourism, its archeological centres, and for being a beautiful city in the southern region of the country. The city is also well known for the traditional festival of Inti Raymi and because one of the seven wonders of the world, Machupicchu, is found there.

loans.use: to buy books for her stall

loans.name: Oscar Moises

texts.es:
Oscar vive junto con Olga y  su hijo en el cantón de San Miguel de los Bancos en la provincia de Pichincha.  San Miguel de los Bancos está ubicado a 94 km de la capital, es un lugar bastante lluvioso y húmedo, está entre los 550 y 1800 metros de altura. Se cree que el cantón obtiene su nombre de una época pasada cuando se talaron grandes árboles y los troncos restantes eran utilizados como grandes bancos para las personas. Los bancos al ser una ciudad importante de tránsito entre la sierra y muchas ciudades costeras ha crecido en buena medida durante los últimos años, el cantón aparte del ecoturismo se sustenta a través de la agricultura y ganadería.
Oscar se dedica al comercio de cerdos, el trabaja alrededor de 12 horas diarias y lo hace solo; cuando le queda tiempo libre se dedica a practicar deporte. Oscar solicita este crédito porque desea invertir en su negocio para hacerlo crecer y así abastecerse de más clientes. La plata que espera recibir de esta inversión la desea utilizar para apoyar en su casa y a su hijo.
texts.en:
Oscar lives with Olga and their child in San Miguel de los Bancos canton in Pichincha province. San Miguel de los Bancos is located 94 km. from the capital and is very wet and humid. It is between 550 to 1800 meters high. It is believed that the canton derives it name from a past period when large trees were cut down and the trunks that remained were used as large benches for people. Los Bancos, being an important transit city between the mountains and many coastal cities, has grown a good deal during recent years.  Apart from eco-tourism the city is sustained by agriculture and stockbreeding.

Oscar is a pig trader. He works around 12 hours a day and he does so alone. When he has spare time he plays sports. He is requesting this loan because he wants to invest in his business so that it will grow and attract more customers. He will use the money he expects to receive from this investment to support his house and child.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Amie

texts.en: Amie is an active microfinance member of PMPC.  She is 38 years old, single, and a resident of Polangyuta, Siquijor, Siquijor in the Philippines.  She has had a sari-sari (general) store for four years and earns a monthly income of Php 3,000.  She is asking for a loan from PMPC, and intends to purchase construction materials to build a fence for her house and sari-sari store.  She wants her house and business more secure, especially during night time.

loans.use: purchase materials to build a fence around her home and store.

loans.name: Eva May

texts.en: Eva May is 25 years old and married with two children.  She has a food vending business in the Philippines, and has requested a loan of PHP 12000 through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients for her food production business.  Eva May has been in this business for four years.  In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: Cástula

texts.es:
Cástula es una mujer de 70 años que vive en el cantón de Quinindé perteneciente a la provincia de Esmeraldas. Quinindé cuenta con un clima tropical lluvioso y tiene dos temporadas climáticas la seca y la lluviosa. Un dato interesante es la única forma de llegar a Quinindé era a través de las vías fluviales hasta finales de los años 60´s cuando se construyó la carretera que va desde la Sierra ecuatoriana a la Costa. Los pilares económicos de Quinindé son la agricultura y la ganadería, en las últimas décadas también se ha beneficiado del comercio. 
Cástula es soltera e inicio su negocio hace poco más de 4 años. Ella tiene un taller de corte y confección y está solicitando su primer crédito. Uno de los principales obstáculos con los que Cástula se ha encontrado es el no haber terminado sus estudios.
Este crédito quiere utilizarlo para la compra de sabanas, edredones y demás materiales. La idea es fortalecer su negocio, expandirlo y así lograr mayores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Cástula is 70 years old and lives in Quinindé canton in the province of Esmeraldas. 

The climate is tropical with lots of rain and has two seasons: the dry season and the rainy season. One interesting piece of information is that the only way to get to Quinindé up until the late 60s was by river. At that time a road was built which goes from the mountains to the coast. The economy of the region is built on agriculture and animal raising, and in the last few years commerce has also brought benefits to the area.

Cástula is single and began her business a little more than four years ago. She runs a sewing business, and this is her first request for a loan. One of the main problems that she has faced is her lack of education.

Cástula wishes to use the loan money to buy sheets, quilts, and other fabric. Her plan is to strengthen her business, expand it, and thus earn more money so she can have a better standard of living.

loans.use: buy sheets, quilts, and other fabric

loans.name: Xerxes

texts.en: Xerxes, a 27-year-old married father of one, lives in the Philippines where he has been providing habal-habal or motorcycle services for five years. Having joined HSPFI this year, he is requesting a loan of PHP 5,000 to pay for motorcycle maintenance. In the future, Xerxes hopes to improve his services.

loans.use: to pay for motorcycle maintenance.

loans.name: Nuevo Amanecer Group

texts.es:
La socia Primitiva tiene 49 años y es casada y fruto de esta hermosa relación tiene dos hijos (Luis Enrique de 31 años y Karla de 22 años), ella es natural de la ciudad de Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. La socia Primitiva es ama de casa pero también en sus horas libres se dedica a la elaboración de artesanía de tipo muñequería, la socia Primitiva tiene un pequeño taller en su domicilio donde elabora sus productos para luego venderlos y distribuirlos a diferentes revendedores de la ciudad. Ya son 31 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Primitiva requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo muñecas, hilos, lana, tela y adornos. (La socia que primitiva esta levantando la mano en la fotografía). 

Este grupo está conformado por vecinos y amigos que formaron el banco comunal “Nuevo Amanecer” en la provincia de Cusco del departamento del Cusco. Este banco comunal está conformado por personas que buscan a cada momento las oportunidades para salir adelante y con su esfuerzo diario entregar un mejor futuro a sus hijos. Las actividades económicas de los socios son por ejemplo; venta de ropa americana, venta de artesanía, venta de vidrios y otros brindan servicio de llamadas.  

Los socios en general agradecen la oportunidad brindada y se comprometen a cumplir con el pago de sus diferentes cuotas en los plazos establecidos. (Las personas que a perecen en la parte inferior de la fotografía llegaron tarde a la reunión del banco comunal). 

Cusco está ubicado en el distrito y provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco en pleno corazón de la antigua ciudad de los Incas y se caracteriza por ser una zona turística, por sus centros arqueológicos, por su centro histórico, por sus paisajes, por su historia y por ser una ciudad encantadora de la Región del Sur del país. Cusco es conocido también por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Group member Primitiva is 49 years old, married, and has two children through that wonderful relationship (Luis Enrique, 31, and Karla, 22). She is a Cusco native and still lives in the same city. 

Primitiva has a small workshop in her home where she designs her products to later be sold and distributed in different retailers in the city. She has made a living from this business for 31 years, and it has done well.

With this opportunity, Primitiva requests a loan to purchase materials for work such as: dolls, thread, yarn, fabric, and decorations. (Primitiva is raising her hand in the photograph).

This group is made up of seniors and friends that form the communal bank "Nuevo Amanecer" (New Dawn) in the Cusco province of the Cusco state department. They are people who are constantly looking for opportunities to further themselves and who work daily to give their children a better future. The types of work these members do include: selling american clothes, selling crafts, selling glassware, and providing telephone services. The members, in general, are grateful for the given opportunity and commit themselves to completing payments for their dues at the established installment rate. 

(The people who appear in the lower left corner of the photograph arrived late to the communal bank meeting). 

Cusco is located in the Cusco district belonging to the Cusco province and Cusco state department. It is the heart of the ancient Incan city and is known for its tourist areas, archaeological centers, historical centers, landscapes, history, and for being the enchanting city in the southern region of the country. Cusco is also known for its traditional celebration, Inti Rayimi, because it takes place at one of the seven wonders of the world, "Machupicchu".

loans.use: to purchase materials for work such as: dolls, thread, yarn, fabric, and decorations.

loans.name: Mirna Elizabeth

texts.es:
Mirna, vive en casa de su madre junto a sus hijos, ella trabaja la costureria,trabaja por las mañanas en una atención de un chalet en un centro escolar, de este negocio logra ganar seis dólares diarios que sirven para el sustento de su familia, en la costurería realiza trabajos que le solicitan los clientes que es eventual.
Ella Solicita un préstamo para comprarse una nueva máquina de coser rana, éste le permitirá hacer mejores trabajos y aumentar su calidad a los clientes, brindándole un mejor servicio.

Su objetivo es buscar las alternativas de las cuales pueda generar ingresos para ayudar a sus hijos a estudiar y al mismo tiempo darse a conocer en la confección de ropa como otros clientes.
texts.en:
Mirna lives in her mother's house with her children. She works in tailoring. She has a morning job tending a food stall in a school. She earns six dollars a day from that business, which she uses to provide for her family. Her tailoring work is occasional, since it depends on her customers' orders.

She is requesting a loan to purchase a new industrial sewing machine, which will allow her to perform better work and increase quality for her customers, who will receive a better service.

Her goal is to find alternatives from which she can obtain enough income for her children to go to school and, at the same time, to make a name for herself in dressmaking among new customers.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine.

loans.name: Luis Anibal

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 29 años que inicio su negocio en la ciudad de Latacunga hace 7 años. Latacunga es una ciudad muy importante en la sierra ecuatoriana, existe mucho comercio que pasa por acá hacia otras ciudades de la sierra o hacia el oriente. Latacunga tiene una temperatura promedio de 12 grados centígrados y se ubica a unos 2750 metros de altura sobre el nivel del mar. La ciudad aparte del comercio se apoya mucho en la ganadería, agricultura y floricultura.
Luis vive con sus tres hijos y su conviviente Gladys. El actualmente trabaja solo y dedica 8 horas diarias a su negocio de comercio de madera. Luis aprendió las técnicas y destrezas desde chiquito a través de la práctica, y considera que actualmente su obstáculo más importante es no haber tenido la posibilidad de acabar con sus estudios. El crédito que Luis está solicitando planea utilizarlo para la compra de material, si el compra al por mayor puede lograr obtener mejores precios y así aumentar sus ganancias. Su sueño es construir su propia casa y ampliar su negocio, si Luis logra esto, considera que tanto su vida como la de sus hijos y su conviviente mejorara.
texts.en:
Luis is a 27 year old man who began his business in Latacunga seven years ago.  Latacunga is a major city in the Ecuadorian mountains and much trade goes through here to other cities in the mountains and to the east. Latacunga’s average temperature is 12 degrees centigrade and it is located 2750 meters above sea level.  Besides commerce, the city relies heavily on livestock farming, agriculture, and floriculture.

Luis lives with his three children and his partner, Gladys.  He currently works alone and spends eight hours a day on his wood business.  He learned the techniques and skills through practicing as a young boy and feels that his greatest obstacle now is not having had the opportunity to complete his studies.  Luis is planning to use the loan he is requesting to purchase material.  If he buys it wholesale, he will be able to get better prices and thus increase his profits.  His dream is to build his own home and expand his business.  If Luis achieves these goals, he believes that his life, as well as the lives of his children and partner, will greatly improve.

loans.use: to purchase wood.

loans.name: Darusi

texts.en:
Darusi is 40 years old and lives with his family in the Kwale District of Kenya.  He is involved in the business of selling firewood and petrol from his home.  He says that both businesses are profitable and he hopes to open a retail shop soon.  

Darusi is a very hardworking person with a great desire to get ahead.  He is married with four girls and two boys between the ages of 6 and 18.  All of them are attending school and his dream is to see them all become professionals.  They own the house they live in, which has neither electricity nor piped water.  

Darusi is requesting this loan to buy firewood and gallons of petrol for sale.

loans.use: to buy firewood and petrol for sale.

loans.name: Masudi

texts.en:
Musudi lives in Msambweni where he continues operating his retail shop that has run for a number of years. He chose this activity because it enables him to spend time with his family since his shop is located in his home. Masudi remembers how he started with a small amount of capital, but thanks to his efforts and loans fron Kiva and Yehu, his business has grown.

Masudi has the desire to expand his business to increase his monthly income and continue educating his children. He is therefore requesting another loan to increase his inventory through the purchase of cooking oil, rice, a weighing machine, bread, etc. His goal for the future is to have a bigger store.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, rice, a weighing machine, bread, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods to stock her general store.

loans.name: Fulgence

texts.en:
Fulgence is 27 years old and is married with two children. He sells shoes, from a store which operates from 8 a.m. until 6 p.m. every day. He currently employs one person to help him and he has one year of experience in this work.

Fulgence has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to buy more shoes to resell. He plans to use any profits generated from this loan to satisfy his family's basic needs and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to purchase more shoes to resell.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is 48 years old and married with four children between 3 and 15 years old. He sells fruits and vegetables like: mango, pineapple, lemon, green vegetable, aubergine etc with 25 years of experience. 

Daniel has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to cultivate more fruits and vegetables like: mango, pineapple, lemon, green vegetable, aubergine etc for resale. With any profits, he will be able to save money for his future and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To cultivate more fruits and vegetables like: mango, pineapple, lemon, green vegetable, aubergine etc for resale.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 46 años que  vive en Latacunga junto con  su esposa Olimpia de 38 años. 
Latacunga es una ciudad que pertenece a la provincia de Cotopaxi en Ecuador. Su ubicación geográfica es en la sierra central del país, y esta a unos 2750 metros sobre el nivel del mar con una temperatura promedio de 12 grados centígrados. Debido a su desarrollo último, y su importancia en cuanto a temas históricos, arquitectónicos y culturales, Latacunga es una de las ciudades más importantes de la sierra. Hoy en día la ciudad es considerada Patrimonio Nacional y en base al censo del año 2010 cuenta con una población de casi
64000 habitantes.  
Luis se dedica al a producción agrícola, una práctica que la aprendió por tradición de sus padres. Luis trabaja alrededor de 8 horas diarias y considera que los dos obstáculos más importantes para su trabajo es la distancia entre su casa  y el terreno donde trabaja y la dificultad que ha tenido para poder acceder a créditos. Por eso este crédito Kiva es una de las últimas opciones que Luis tiene, el lo planea invertir en su negocio para mejorar su producción, y espera que esto derive en la mejora de su calidad de vida como tal.
texts.en:
Luis is a 46 year-old man who lives in Latacunga with his wife, Olimpia, 38 years old. Latacunga is a city that is part of Cotopaxi Province in Ecuador. It is located geographically in the central mountains of the country at some 2750 meters above sea level with an average temperature of 12 °C (53.6 °F). Due to its recent development and its importance with respect to history, architecture and culture, Latacunjga is one of the most important cities in the mountains. Nowadays, the city is considered a National Heritage site and, based on the 2010 census, has a population of almost 64,000 inhabitants.

Luis is a farmer, a job passed down traditionally from his parents. He works around 8 hours a day and considers that the two most important obstacles in his work are the distance between his house and his fields and the difficulty he has had getting credit. Thus this loan from Kiva is one of the last options Luis has. He plans to invest it in his business in order to increase production and he hopes this will lead to an improvement in his quality of life, as such.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizers for his crops

loans.name: Sidonie Claire

texts.fr: Claire est une jeune femme âgée de 32 ans célibataire et mère de 05 enfants dont l'âge est compris entre 1an et demi et 15 ans. Elle est commerçante dans un quartier de la capittale.Elle exerce l'activité de vente de poissons secs depuis une dizaine d'années. l'exprérience acquise dans ce secteur d'activité, la qualité des produits proposés et les prix pratiqués  lui ont permis de se constituer une clientèle qui est allée grandissante et exigente  au fil du temps. La petitesse de son chiffre d'affaires ne lui permet plus de faire face à une demande sans cesse croissante. Elle sollicite donc ce crédit  dans l'optique d'augmenter les stocks de sa marchandise et satisfaire ses nombreux clients. les bénéfices générés lui permettront de scolariser les études de ses enfants , de continuer à subvenir aux besoins de sa grande  familleet surtout reinvetir dans son activité.
texts.en:
Claire is a young woman who is 32 years old and single. She is the mother of 5 children who range in age from 1 1/2 to 15.

She has been selling fish in an area of the capital for about a decade. Over time, her experience, the quality of her products, and her pricing have resulted in a growing and demanding customer base.

Her small sales volume prevents her from meeting her ever-increasing demand. She is therefore asking for a loan in order to increase her stock and satisfy her numerous clients. 

The income she earns will allow her to send her children to school, meet the needs of her family, and reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy smoked fish.

loans.name: Adalgiza

texts.es: Adalgiza invirtió su anterior credikiva en cerámicas y pinturas además de marcos para cuadros y le fue muy bien en sus ventas, por eso está muy entusiasmada solicitando un nuevo credikiva, para invertir nuevamente en materiales e insumos para sus cuadros y vender nuevas obras de arte. Su mensaje a los financiadores e Kiva es el siguiente: “Muy agradecida por su labor, que Dios los bendiga y que sigan creciendo cada día mas, para que puedan ayudar a pequeños microempresarias como yo. “
texts.en: Adalgiza invested her previous loan in ceramics, paints, and frames for paintings.  Her sales are going well and for this reason, she is very enthusiastic about requesting a new Kiva loan.  Once again, she will invest in materials and supplies for paintings in order to sell new art work.  Her message to the lenders and Kiva is the following: “I am very grateful for your work, may God bless you, and may you continue growing more each day so that you can help small micro-entrepreneurs like me”.

loans.use: to purchase materials and supplies for paintings in order to sell new art work.

loans.name: Nathalie Rosine

texts.fr: Nathalie Rosine est une jeune femme âgéee de 25 ans,célibataire et mère de d' un enfant âgé de 3 mois.Elle a également 2autres personnes à sa charge.Elle est coiffeuse et exerce son activité dans un quartier dela place depuis 1 an.Son dynamisme et son savoir faire lui ont permis d'acquerir une clientèle considérable. L'augmentation continuelle de sa clientèle rend l'offre inférieure à la demande d'où la rupture permanente de ses stocks de marchandises qui pousse certains de ses clients à se tourner vers la concurrence. D'ou l'importance de ce crédit dans son activité qui lui permettra d'augmenter les stocks de ses produits de beautés( cartons de lotions et de lait et savons de beauté, les champoiong...) cecei satisfera sa clientèle, augmentera ses ventes et donc sa marge bénéficiaire. Une partie de ses bénéfices sera réinvesti dans l'activité afin de l'étendre et l'autre lui permettra de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Nathalie Rosine is a young woman aged 25. She is single, and is mother to one 3-month-old child. She also has a further two people under her care.

Nathalie Rosine is a hairdresser, and has worked in this business in a local neighborhood for the past year. Her dynamic nature and know-how have allowed her to obtain a considerable customer base. The constant growth in her customers has meant that supply is lower than demand, and she therefore experiences permanent stock shortages. This has led to some of her customers turning to the competition. 

A loan is therefore very important for Rosine’s business, as it will allow her to increase her stock of beauty products (boxes of lotions and beauty creams and soaps, as well as shampoo). This will ensure customer satisfaction, increase her sales and, therefore, provide her with a higher profit margin. Rosine will reinvest part of her profits in expanding her business, and the rest will be used to provide for her family.

loans.use: To buy beauty products (boxes of lotions, beauty creams and soaps, and shampoo)

loans.name: Oksana

texts.ru:
Оксана спланировала и мудро распорядилась предыдущим кредитом от КИВА, вложив его в планомерное развитие своего дела, тем самым увеличив бизнес и прибыль. Этот последний кредит от КИВА помог Оксане финансово стабилизироваться за счет хорошего дохода. 
Оксана надеется вложить этот кредит в размере 22 000 гривен в закупку товара на осенний сезон. Она намеренно берет кредит перед сменой сезона, чтобы закупить достаточное количество товара для последующей реализации в период, когда данная группа товара будет востребована.
texts.en: Oksana planned well and wisely used her previous loan from Kiva, having invested it into a gradual development of her business; thus, increasing her business and profit.  This last loan from Kiva helped her to get financially stable due to a good income.  Oksana hopes to invest this loan in the amount of 22,000 hryvnia into a purchase of merchandise for the autumn season.  She is intentionally requesting the loan prior to the seasonal change, so that she could buy enough merchandise for the subsequent sale during the period when this merchandise group will be in demand.

loans.use: to purchase an inventory of merchandise for the autumn season

loans.name: Elisabeth

texts.fr: elisabeth est une femme âgée de 62 ans , veuve et mère d'un enfant âgé de 39 ans.Elle a egalement 05 autres personnes à sa charge.Elle est commerçante dans un quartier de la capitale où elle exerce son activité depuis 05 ans.les bonnes relations entretenues avec son voisinage lui ont croissance de sa clientèle qu'elle n'arrive plus plus à satisfaire à cause de la rupture permanente des stocks de marchandises.Elle sollicite un crédit pour étendre son activité(  Achat des produits de premiéres nécéssité ( savons, huile...)afin de satisfaire sa clientèle abondande.les bénéfices générés lui permettront d'augmenter ses stocks de marchandises,épargner et répondre aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Elisabeth is a 62-year-old woman, who is widowed and mother to one child aged 39. She also has a further five people under her care, and has worked in retail in a neighborhood in the capital for the past five years. Elisabeth’s good relations with her neighbors have allowed her to increase her customer base. However, due to permanent stock shortages, she cannot meet her customers’ requests.

Elisabeth has requested a loan to expand her business (buying basic necessity products such as soaps and oil to meet the needs of her large customer base). The profits generated will allow her to increase her stocks, save, and provide for her family.

loans.use: To buy basic necessity products (oil, soaps, etc.).

loans.name: Marie Therese

texts.fr: Marie est une femme de 49 ans mariée et mère d'enfants . Elle fait la vente en gros et détail des vivres frais  en fonction des saisons dans un marché de la place depuis 15 ans. Elle a un bonne connaissance des fournisseurs, et surtout de sa clientèle qu'elle a acquise au fil du temps grâce à son expérience dans ce domaine. Elle souhaiterai augmenter son stock de marchandises en achetant des cajots de tomates et des filets de papayes  qui permettra de mieux satisfaire la demande constante de sa clientèle et d'éviter les ruptures de stocks, d'augmneter ses ventes et donc sa marge bénéficiaire. Elle économisera son bénéfice pour non seulement agrandir son activité mais aussi aider son époux à résoudre certains besoins de leur famille.
texts.en: Marie is 49 years old, married and a mother. She has been selling fresh, seasonal food, both wholesale and retail, at a local market for 15 years. She has a good knowledge of her suppliers and knows her customers, which she has acquired over time thanks to her good experience in her line of work, particularly well. She would like build a good inventory by buying some crates of tomatoes, thereby avoiding a shortage of stock and making sure she can satisfy her steady customer demand. She will save her profits so that she can both grow her business and help her husband to address some of their family's needs.

loans.use: to buy crates of tomatoes and bags of papayas.

loans.name: Marie Madeleine

texts.fr: madeleine est une jeune femme âgée de 24 ans,mariée et mère de 2 enfants dont l'âge varie entre 3 et 7 ans tous vont à l' ecole. elle a aussi à sa charge une personne. Elle est couturière dans un quartier de la capitale  où elle a ouvert un atélier de couture qu' elle gére depuis 4 ans. la diligence de ses services, son savoir faire et expérience dans ce domaine et sa créativité lui ont permis d'acquerir et fidéliser sa clientèle au fil du temps.Elle aimerait acheter un ballot de tissus pour revendre et coudre aussi et petits matériel de couture(bobine de fil, carton de boutons, des épingle...) en stock mais son capital ne le lui permet pas. D'où l'importance de ce crédit pour son activité. parce qu'il lui premettra non seulement de satisfaire sa clientèle , mais aussi d'augmenter ses ventes et donc sa marge bénéficiaire.Les bénéfices générés l'aideront à étendre son activité et d'aider son epoux dans les taches quotidiennes.
texts.en: Madeleine is a young 24-year-old woman who is married and the mother of 2 children, aged 3 and 7, who both go to school. She also supports one other person in addition to her children. She is a seamstress and has been working in a local district for 4 years. Her speed and creativity have enabled her to acquire a clientèle which has become loyal over time. The inadequacy of her capital makes her unable to satisfy her numerous customers any more. She is requesting a loan so that she can buy small materials like rolls of fabric and thread and increase her inventory of merchandise. The profits generated will enable her to expand her business, build some savings and support her husband with the daily chores.

loans.use: to buy small materials like rolls of fabric and thread.

loans.name: Mathurin

texts.fr: Maturin est une jeune homme de 33 ans marié père de 4 enfants dont l'age varie entre 2 et 6 ans. Trois de ses enfants vont à l'école. il est commerçant et a ouvert une boutique de chaussure qu'il gère dans un quartier de la capitale depuis 6 ans déjà. Son acceuil chaleureux,ses bons conseils vestimentaires et son expérience lui ont valu une clientèle assez importante. la croissance de sa clientèle lui pose un problème parce qu'il n'arrive plus à la satisfaire tout ceci à cause de la petitesse de son capital qui l'oblige à aller au déballage chaque week end pour acheter en détail et revenir vendre. et ça ne rapporte pas assez d'où l'importance de ce crédit pour Mathurin qui lui permettra de s'acheter un ballot de chaussures pour sa boutique. ceci lui permettra de satisfaire non seulement de satisfaire sa clientèle, mais aussi de réaliser plus de bénéfices. Il souhaiterai réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son activité afin de l'agrandiret économiser pour la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Maturin is a 33-year-old man who is the father of four children, ranging in ages between 2 and 6.  Three of his children attend school.

Maturin is involved in business.  He has opened a shoe store which he has been managing in one of the neighborhoods of the capital city for the past six years already.  Thanks to his warm welcome, to the sound advice he gives regarding clothes, and to his experience, he has built a rather large customer-base.

However, the fact that his customer base is expanding is becoming a problem; he can no longer satisfy all his customers, due to his small capital.  He currently has to go to the warehouse every weekend to buy and resell in retail quantities, which is not very profitable.

This is why it has become so important for Maturin to request a loan.  This loan will help him to buy a bale of shoes for his shop.

This will also allow him, not only to satisfy his clients' needs, but to make more profits.  He would like to reinvest his profits into the expansion of his business, and to save some money to pay for his children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy a bale of shoes.

loans.name: Odette

texts.en: Odette is 33 years old, married to a technician and the mother of four children, all of whom attend school. Odette wants to invest in a new tailoring business because she believes that this will allow her to earn more profits.  She is requesting a loan to buy a new sewing machine, and plans to use the additional profits she earns to renovate her house.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Philomene

texts.en:
Philomene is a mother of two children and married to a farmer.  Both children attend schools. 

She sells different foodstuffs. With the loan, she wants to add more rice and cooking oil for sale. 

The profits from the business will be used to provide food for the family.

loans.use: To buy more rice and cooking oil for sale.

loans.name: Dorys

texts.es: A Dorys de 58 años de edad le alcanza el tiempo para muchas actividades, pues es una mujer con mucho olfato para el negocio, que desde hace 7 años está dedicada a ellos: primero emprendió una confección de ropa, luego se enfocó en el comercio de prendas de platas, posteriormente agregó otras mercancías, se especializó en venta de calzado deportivo artesanal traído  de Chinú, un corregimiento de Córdoba, así como también  fabrica en su casa productos capilares, que tienen una gran aceptación en su mercado y para completar diariamente vende almuerzos para empleados de una universidad cercana y también últimamente se enfocó en el comercio  de colonias norteamericanas.  Con todas estas actividades ha logrado generar ingresos que cada día aumentan su propio bienestar y el de su familia,  conformado por su esposo y sus hijos mayores de edad. Su negocio como comerciante le genera pedidos que la benefician, porque aumenta su volumen de ventas cuando cuenta con el capital de trabajo suficiente para hacer sus compras en volumen y esto en la medida en que se incrementa su clientela se convierte en su principal desafío; sus compras las realiza con una frecuencia semanal y en la modalidad de contado, cada vez que reúne el dinero, producto de sus cuentas por cobrar. Sus ventas las realiza puerta a puerta y mediante créditos otorgados a su clientela para que le paguen en un corto plazo. Dorys ha recibido dos financiamientos de la Fundación Mario Sato Domingo, mediante el cual ha fortalecido su negocio de preparación de alimentos, pues ha comprado herramientas y equipos necesarios para hacer más eficiente su labor, como una estufa industrial y una olla de gran tamaño para la preparación de sus sopas. También con los financiamientos ha logrado mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales de vivienda pasando de tener una casa de madera a una e materiales como con la que hoy cuenta. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, tercer financiamiento con esta organización y con el cual comprará insumos para elaborar tratamientos capilares, materias prima para elaborar los alimentos de su oferta y comprará sandalias artesanales hechas con las manos de indígenas en el departamento de Córdoba, al norte de Colombia, quienes también se benefician de esta inversión con credikiva, en cuanto a que Dorys les compra de contado y en una cantidad importante, que les ayuda a mejorar también sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
58-year old Dorys finds the time for many activities as she is a woman with a flair for business. She’s been in business for seven years; first she learned how to make clothing, then she focussed on silver jewellery, and finally she added other merchandise. She specialized in sport footwear brought from Chinú, a town near Córdoba. She also makes hair accessories in her home, items that her customers really like. To round out her day she sells lunches to the employees at the nearby university, and recently she started to do business in North America residential developments. With all this activity, Dorys has managed to generate an income that increases her own wellbeing and that of her family every day. She has a husband and grown children.

As a businesswoman she obtains orders and then sales increase when she has sufficient working capital to make bulk purchases. She makes purchases on a weekly basis using cash and always makes sure that her books are up to date. Dorys sells door-to-door on short-term credit. 

She has received two loans from the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation and used the money to strengthen her food-preparation business. She has bought the tools and equipment necessary for a more efficient operation: an industrial stove and a large pot for making soups. Dorys has also used the loans to improve her living conditions moving from a wooden house to the one she has today made of more substantial building materials. 

She is now seeking another loan, her third with this organization, to buy supplies to make hair accessories, food ingredients for daily specials, and sandals handmade by the local people from the department of Córdoba in the north of Colombia. They will also benefit from this loan as Dorys will pay cash and buy a large quantity so they can also improve their standard of living.

loans.use: to buy hair accessories supplies, food ingredients, and handmade sandals

loans.name: John Jairo

texts.es: John Jairo de 26 años  vive en Ciudad Bicentenario, un macroproyecto de vivienda de interés social en la ciudad de  Cartagena, apoyado por la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo en el marco de cumplir su propósito de gestionar la construcción  comunidades sostenibles. Con la  necesidad  de generar ingresos,  John emprendió su propia aventura de negocios, iniciando con la venta de comidas rápidas desde hace 4 años;  allí ofrece las deliciosas comidas rápidas como: hamburguesas, perros calientes, y todas las combinaciones de carnes, papa, chorizo etc. con salsas que él mismo prepara. En su puesto de trabajo  elabora el  producto  en cada  momento, es decir cada vez que su cliente llega a comprarle. Su trabajo lo desarrolla desde las 7:00 pm  hasta las 12 de la noche siempre y hasta que  no haya ningún cliente en su negocio y no tenga existencia de los productos. Su clientela está ubicada en el mismo sector donde habita y tiene como meta estimular su venta día a día. Por eso se acerca a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para acceder a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a esta organización, mediante el cual comprará un horno microondas, una carpa y 3 juegos de sillas, con los cuales favorecerá la comodidad de su clientela y la eficiencia en su trabajo productivo. Y esto es justamente el éxito de su inversión en la que tarde o tempano  aumentará su clientela y ganará mucho mas dinero.
texts.en:
John Jairo is 26 and lives in Ciudad Bicentenario, a public housing macro-development project which is supported by Fundación Mario Santo Domingo as part of their process of building sustainable communities in the city of Cartagena. 
John started his own business venture because he needed to generate income. He began selling fast food four years ago, and offers delicious fast foods, such as hamburgers, hot dogs, and any combination of meat, potatoes, chorizo etc. served with sauces he prepares himself. At his food stall, meals are made to order, that is, whenever the customer arrives to make a purchase. He works from 7:00 pm to 12:00 am, or until there are no customers left or he runs out of ingredients. His customer base resides in the same sector where he lives. 
His goal is to stimulate sales day by day. That is why he has approached Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, so that he may access a Kiva loan, requesting financing from this organization for the first time. He will use it to purchase a microwave oven, a marquee, and three sets of chairs, which will make his customers more comfortable and his productivity more efficient. That is precisely the success he expects from his investment, that sooner or later it will cause his customer base to increase and he will make a lot more money.

loans.use: to purchase a microwave oven, a marquee, and three sets of chairs.

loans.name: Claudine

texts.en: Claudine is 40 years old. She is the mother of five children aged between eight and five months. They all go to school. She sells kids' clothes and has been in the business for two years. She wants the loan to buy more kids' clothes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for the children.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for sale.

loans.name: Deudonne

texts.en: Deudonne is 28 years old. He is married and has one child aged one year. He sells various items in a boutique. He has been running his business for three years. With this loan, he wants to buy new items to sell, such as plastic items. The profits from his business will be put toward his savings. He is very dedicated to changing his life and caring for his family in the future.

loans.use: To buy more new items such as plastic items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods to stock her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods to stock her general store.

loans.name: Moise

texts.fr: Moise est un homme de 24 ans marié père de 3 enfants dont l'age varie entre 8 mois et 5 ans, l'un deux va déjà à l'école. Il est menuisier et a ouvert un atelier dans la capitale qu'il gère depuis 12 ans. Son savoir faire et son expérience lui ont permis d'agrandir et fidéliser sa clientèle au fil du temps. Mais le petit capital de Moise ne lui permet pas de fabriquer plusieurs meubles et de les exposer sur la dévanture de sa structure pour attirer la clientèle et pour vendre aussi. C'est pour cela qu'il sollicite ce crédit pour acheter du bois, des planches et tapisseries pour meubles. Le bénéfice que ça lui apportera l'aidera en partie à subvenir aux besoins de sa famille, d'économiser pour la scolarité de ses enfants et le reste sera réinvesti dans son activité pour l'agrandir.
texts.en:
Moise is a 24-year-old married man, who has three children aged between 8 months and 5 years. One of his children goes to school. He is a carpenter, and has a workshop in the capital which he has run for the past 12 years. His know-how and experience have allowed him to build up a large, loyal customer base over time.

However, Moise’s low capital does not allow him to manufacture several pieces of furniture to put on display in his workshop window to attract customers (and to sell this furniture). This is why he has requested this loan to buy wood, planks and upholstery to make furniture. Part of the profits he will receive will help him to provide for his family and save for his children’s education. He plans to reinvest the rest in expanding his business.

loans.use: To buy planks of wood and upholstery to make furniture.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
José  tiene 34 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene 4 hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 10, 9, 7 y 2 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LAS PALMAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto campo Alegre, Pertenece al Cantón Bab se dedican a labores Agrícolas.

José se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz hace 20 años.  Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas y abonos agrícolas.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos sin ningún tipo de problema. El sueño es poder comprase una casa. No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema. En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
José, 34, is in a common law relationship; he has four children.  He lives with his wife and children who are 10, 9, 7 and 2 years old in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  He is a member of the “Las Palmas” communal bank which is located in Recinto Campo Alegre belonging to Bab Canton; he works in agriculture.

José has been a corn and rice farmer for 20 years.  His purchases and his sales take place in Ventanas.  He’s asking for the loan to buy seeds and manure.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy supplies problem-free.  His dream is to be able to buy a house.  He’s had no type of problem.  In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy windshields, headlights, fenders and a dashboard for his taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods to stock her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy raw ingredients used in making specialty dishes

loans.name: Stefaniya

texts.ru:
Стефания – мелкий предприниматель из Ивано-Франковска. Она занимается реализацией разного рода хозяйственных товаров на одном из крупных местных рынков. В этом бизнесе она уже 20 лет. Собственной торговой точки пока нет, приходится арендовать. Работает на точке сама, наемных рабочих нет. 

Стефании на данный момент необходим кредит в размере 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы приобрести закаточные ключи, крышки и другие товары для консервации. В Украине август и сентябрь – самые горячие сезоны консервирования, поэтому данная группа товаров пользуется у покупателей большой популярностью. Стефания надеется, что на время сезона закруток ее доход увеличится примерно на 40%. За счет полученной прибыли Стефания затем надеется сделать небольшой ремонт в туалете своей квартиры.  Со временем она хотела бы иметь больше свободного времени, чтобы писать книги, так как ее главное хобби – литература и сочинение прозы.
texts.en: Stefaniya is a small entrepreneur from Ivano-Frankivsk.  She is involved in selling various types of household goods at one of the large local markets.  She has been in this business for 20 years.  She does not yet have her own retail outlet, so she has to lease one.  She works there herself and does not have any hired workers.  Stefaniya currently needs a loan in the amount of 20,000 hryvnia to purchase seamer tools, lids and other goods for canning.  August and September in the Ukraine are the hot seasons for canning, and this is why this merchandise group is highly demanded by customers.  Stefaniya hopes that during the canning season her income would increase by about 40%.  She then hopes to use the resulting profit to make a small repair in her apartment bathroom.  With time, Stefaniya wants to have more free time to write books because her main hobby is literature and writing prose.

loans.use: to purchase seamer tools, lids and other goods for canning

loans.name: Aida Mbène

texts.fr: Mme Aida Mbène réside tout près de l'IMCEC ce qui est un avantage pour elle de pouvoir bénéficier des services de cette dernière en matière de crédit et d'épargne. Elle s’active dans le commerce depuis 3 ans en vendant des tissus et produits cosmétiques. Mme Aida Mbène travaille de 10 h à 16 h  et c’est avec les revenus issus de son activité qu’elle arrive à épauler son mari pour les charges familiales. Elle sollicite un prêt de  100 000 f pour acheter 10 tissus pour femmes, 5 douzaines de parfum pour vendre. Avec ce prêt elle compte aussi diversifier les produits qu’elle met sur le marché. Mme Aida Mbène veut un jour avoir un capital chiffré à des millions de francs.
texts.en:
Aida Mbène lives next to the UIMCEC branch office, an advantage which helps her benefit from the organizations savings and credit services. She has been in business for three years selling fabrics and cosmetics from her house. She works from 10am to 4pm. 

With the income from this business, she helps her husband with the family expenses. 

She is asking for a loan of 100,000 francs CFA to buy 10 fabrics for women and 5 dozen perfumes to sell. 

With this loan she hopes to diversify the products that she puts on the market. 

Aida Mbène wants one day to have millions of francs in capital.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and fabrics to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his rice field.

loans.name: Ayidote 7 Group

texts.fr: Le groupe AYIDOTE 7 est formé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier au Bénin. La représentante de ce groupe, nommée Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi, est celle dont la main est levée sur la photo. Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi est mariée à un cuisinier nommé Samuel. Le couple a six enfants, dont certains scolarisés, et tous à leur charge. Le couple vit ensemble avec leurs enfants et subvient ensemble aux divers besoins de la famille. Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Il y a près de vingt cinq ans que Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi exerce comme activité, la couture à son domicile; ce qui lui permet de répondre sans grande difficulté aux besoins de sa famille. Parallèlement à cette activité, Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi vend des bois de chauffage et des fournitures de couture. Dans le souci de mieux répondre aux exigences de sa clientèle, Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi désire renforcer et diversifier son activité. Pour ce faire, Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe AYIDOTE 7, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en: The AYIDOTE 7 group is composed of three people who reside in the same neighbourhood in Benin. The representative of the group, named Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi, is the one with her hand raised in the photo. Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi is married to a cook named Samuel. The couple has six children, some of whom attend school and all of whom are dependent. The couple lives together with their children and share the family expenses. Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi did not go to school. For about twenty years she has been running a sewing business from her home; this enables her to provide for her family's needs without too much difficulty. In addition to this business, Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi sells firewood and tailoring supplies. With the objective of better satisfying her clients' demands, Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi wishes to reinforce and diversify her activity. To achieve this, with the other members of the AYIDOTE 7 group, Germaine Akoua Kpèssoussi requests a loan from ALIDé.

loans.use: to buy tailoring supplies and firewood

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is 48 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child. Agnes has a food/retail shop, or sari-sari store, that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, personal care products, home use products and beverages. She has had this business for 13 years. 

She has requested a loan of 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages. Agnes has been a member of HSPFI since 2012. In the future, Agnes hopes to improve her business for the education of her child.

loans.use: to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages

loans.name: Kevin

texts.es:
Kevin es soltero y no tiene hijos; vive en la casa de sus padres ocupando solo una habitación de ladrillo y el piso de tierra, la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Satélite de la ciudad de El Alto.
Actualmente percibe ingresos ya que trabaja por más de ocho horas al día en una empresa privada de transportes como empleado y con lo que gana debe cubrir los gastos de alimentación y ayudar en los pagos de servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para la construcción de una habitación más  en la casa de sus padres ya que desea darles más comodidad y mejorar su calidad de vida ya que con lo poco que gana no le alcanza para la construcción.
El sueño de Kevin es estudiar contabilidad y mejorar sus ingresos para poder independizarse.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Kevin is single and has no children.  He lives in his parents’ house occupying a single room with brick walls and a dirt floor.  The house is located in the city of El Alto’s Satélite zone.

He earns income at present working more than 8 hours daily as an employee in a private transportation firm and uses his earnings to cover food costs and to help pay basic utility costs for his family.

He needs the loan for the construction of another bedroom at his parent’s house because he’d like to provide more comfort and better quality of life for them; what little he earns is insufficient to do so.  Kevin’s dream is to study accounting and to improve his income so that he can become independent.  

This is his second loan request to IMPRO and first to KIVA.

loans.use: to pay to add a bedroom to his parents' house.

loans.name: Arturo

texts.es:
Arturo, es viudo y tiene cinco hijos y los cinco ya son independientes; vive en casa propia ocupando solo una habitación con paredes de ladrillo y el piso de tierra , la casa se encuentra ubicada en la zona Alto San Pedro de la ciudad de La Paz.
El estudió solo hasta terminar la secundaria y actualmente percibe ingresos ya que se dedica a la elaboración de cotillon, para eventos infantiles y otros acontecimientos ya que con lo que gana trabajando por más de diez horas al día debe cubrir sus gastos de alimentación y pago de servicios básicos.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de cartulina, ceda  y cotillon por cantidad para la elaboración de sus productos para mejorar sus ingresos, pues tiene un pedido especial que no desea perder por falta de capital.
El sueño de Arturo es construir una tienda en su casa para vender sus productos y no hacerlo de forma ambulante como hasta ahora ya que para su edad es muy sacrificado.
Es la décimo segunda vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la novena  vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Arturo’s a widower with five children all of whom are now independent.  He lives in his own house occupying a single room with brick walls and dirt floor.  The house is located in the city of La Paz’s Alto San Pedro zone.

He only completed secondary school and currently earns income making foam party supplies for children’s parties and other events.  With what he earns working more than 10 hours daily he must cover his food and basic utility costs.

He needs the loan to buy construction paper, silk and foam in large amounts to make his items in order to improve his income because he has a pending special order and he does not want to lose it for lack of capital.  

Arturo’s dream is to build a store at home to sell his products and not have to do it from place to place anymore because at his age it’s very demanding.  This is his 12th loan request to IMPRO and ninth from KIVA.

loans.use: to buy crafts supplies.

loans.name: Felix Obtavio

texts.es:
Félix tiene 39 años de edad, vive en unión libre junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos de 11 y 7 años en el Cantón Pueblo Viejo.

Los miembros de la V.R.C. UNIDO SOMOS  se encuentra ubicada en el recinto El Marañón por la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo,  esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol.

Félix se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol. Compra sus productos en Comercial  Agro insumos Karlita y los vende en el comercial Castillo.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, arroz y fréjol compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentar desafíos como las plagas y enfermedades y la variedad del clima. Su sueño es incrementar el negocio.

Le gusta practicar el deporte y escuchar música.
texts.en:
Félix is 39 years old and lives with his common law wife and two children, who are 11 and 7 years old, in Pueblo Viejo canton.

The members of the Unidos Somos Communal Bank are located in the El Marañón area of Puerto Pechiche parish belonging to Pueblo Viejo canton. This communal bank engages in short cycle cultivation of maize, rice and beans.

Félix is a farmer growing maize, rice and beans. He buys his products from Comercial Agroinsumos Karlita and sells them in Comercial Castillo.

He is requesting the loan to plant maize, rice and corn and to buy supplies and fertilizer for his crops. Support from the loan will help him to financially meet his needs and to confront challenges such as pest infestations and the unpredictable weather.  His dream is to expand his business.

He enjoys playing sports and listening to music.

loans.use: to plant corn, rice, and beans, and to buy supplies and fertilizer for the crops.

loans.name: Simon

texts.es:
Simón tiene 62 años de edad es casado tiene 6 hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de 20, 19, 17, 15, 13 y 11 años de edad en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LAS PALMAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto campo Alegre, Pertenece al Cantón Bab se dedican a labores Agrícolas.Simón es jornalero se dedica a sembrar arroz, maíz hace 50 años, Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en ventanas.


Solicita el crédito para trabajar en la siembra de maíz, arroz y poder comprar los abonos agrícolas.
Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos sin ningún tipo de problema. El sueño es poder tener terreno y una casa. 
No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problema. En los tiempos libres le gusta dedicarse más al trabajo.
texts.en:
Simón is 62 years old and married with six children.  He lives with his wife and children, ages 20, 19, 17, 15, 13, and 11, in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos province. He is a member of the “Las Palmas” Communal Bank located in the “Campo Alegre” precinct, belonging to the Baba Canton.  The communal bank is dedicated to agricultural labors.  Simón has been a day laborer for fifty years, planting rice and corn.  He makes his purchases and sales in Ventanas.  

He is requesting the loan to work in corn and rice planting, and be able to purchase fertilizers. With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy supplies without any problem.  His dream is to be able to have land and a house. He has not had any problems.  In his spare time, he enjoys doing additional work.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer.

loans.name: Zenovia

texts.es:
La socia Zenovia sigue perteneciendo al banco comunal “Santo Domingo” y las reuniones del banco comunal son cada treinta  en el distrito del Cusco de la provincia del Cusco del departamento del Cusco. La socia Zenovia, tiene 53 años de edad y está separada de su pareja pero tiene 3 hijos. La socia nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. 

La socia Zenovia sigue con  el negocio de venta de comida, ella tiene un pequeño restaurante donde prepara y expende sus platos de comida como por ejemplo de estofado de pollo, rocoto relleno, lomo saltado y entre otros platos, la socia Zenovia trabaja desde  las 4:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m. La socia Zenovia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, aceite, pollos, carnes y verduras. La socia Zenovia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Zenovia still belongs to communal bank Santo Domingo. Meetings are held every month in the district of Cusco of the province of Cusco in the region of Cusco. Zenovia is 53 years old and separated, but has 3 children. She was born in the city of Cusco and still lives there. She still has her food-selling business, which is a tiny restaurant where she prepares and serves dishes she makes, such as chicken stew, stuffed rocoto pepper, and sautéed pork. She works from four in the morning to nine at night. She asks for a loan to buy ingredients such as rice, oil, chicken, meat, and vegetables. Zenovia is happy to benefit from this loan and promises to honour the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to cook meals to sell.

loans.name: Narangarav

texts.en:
Narangarav, 32, is an accountant, and she works in a private company. She is requesting a loan to repair her old house and fence. She lives with her family in the ger district, an area of the city with no running water, minimal roads and spotty electricity, in Ulaanbaatar, the capital of Mongolia. 

Her house is kind of small and suffers heat loss in winter through its walls and door. Therefore she has decided to add an extension to her house with bricks and cement. It will reduce the heat loss, and her house will be warmer. She thinks that it will help cut her coal usage. The loan she is taking will be used to cover the cost of building materials to add an extension and insulation to her small house.

loans.use: To cover the cost of building materials to add an extension and insulation to her small house.

loans.name: Venuste

texts.en: Venuste is 32 years old. He is single. He sells sodas and juice. He has been in the business for ten years. With the loan he wants to add more sodas and juice for sale. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest in the business.

loans.use: To buy more sodas and juices for sale.

loans.name: Baljinnyam

texts.en:
Baljinnyam is a 61-year-old widow, who lives with her grandson, Achgerel. He will enter college this season. She is an elderly, hardworking woman.	

Because she was a herder in the countryside from childhood until 1992, she learned to make felt and twine wool. Consequently, she has extensive experience and now runs her own business making traditional Mongolian clothes and covers, belts, beds and felt mattresses for gers. 

Because her products are well known by the rural residents, she has many clients. She requests a loan of 1,000,000 MNT to buy felt and other raw materials to make bedding and other items for gers.

loans.use: To buy felt and other raw materials to make traditional Mongolian bedding.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana Maria es soltera y no tiene hijos, vive en casa de su madre , la casa esta ubicada en la zona Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Actualmente trabaja por más de ocho horas al día ya que es empleada en una empresa privada y de esta manera cubre sus gastos de alimentación, educación y pago de servicios básicos.
El crédito lo requiere para pagar la instalación de gas domiciliario ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para pagar esta instalación de esta forma desea  mejorar su calidad de vida.
El sueño de Ana Maria, es mejorar sus ingresos para construir su casa, independizarse y tener más comodidad.
Es la cuarta vez que solicita crédito junto a IMPRO y la primera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Ana María’s single and has no children.  She lives in her mother’s house located in the city of La Paz’s Sopocachi zone.  She’s currently employed and works as an employee in a private firm; this is how she covers food, education and basic utility costs.  She needs the loan to pay for gas installation at home because what she earns is insufficient to do so and improve her quality of life.  

Ana María’s dream is to improve her income in order to build a house, become independent and have more comfort.  This is the fourth loan request to IMPRO and first to KIVA.

loans.use: to pay for gas installation in her mother's house.

loans.name: Karomat

texts.ru: Кароматчон любящая жена и мать двоих детей.   Она работает в средней школе города.  Уже 13 лет как она обучает детей компьютерной грамотности.Заработная плата у нее хватает только на семейные нужды.  Кароматчон живет с родителями мужа, муж Каромат делает ремонты квартир и помещений,  но выручка у него тоже маленькая, поэтому она получает у нас очередной кредит, на  первый кредит приобрела мебель. Настоящий кредит получает чтобы оплатить за школу своих детей так как начинается учебный год.  Она очень  благодарна за финансовую поддержку, также в дальнейшем надеется на сотрудничество с Арванд.
texts.en: Karomat is a loving wife and mother of two children.  She works at a secondary school in the city.  She has been teaching children computer skills for 13 years.  Her salary is only enough for family needs.  Karomat lives with her husband's parents.  Her husband does apartment and building repairs, but his salary is also small.  This is why Karomat is requesting another loan from us.  She used her first loan to purchase furniture.  She is requesting this loan to pay for her children's school because the school year is starting.  Karomat is very grateful for the financial support and hopes to continue partnering with Arvand.

loans.use: to pay for her children's school

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson is 29 years old and lives in the town of Kyenjojo in the Mubende region of Uganda. He is married and has one child. For the past 5 years, Wilson has been working hard to manage his small business, which sells electrical items like wire cables. 

To help expand his business, Wilson has requested a loan of 2,000,000 Ugandan Shillings from BRAC Uganda. The loan will be used to purchase more electrical items like wire cables, main switches and wiring gadgets, and will help Wilson to generate greater profits and improve his family standard of living. Wilson hopes that in the future he will be able to own a big well-stocked shop. 

Wilson is a member of BRAC's Small Enterprise Program (SEP).  The program primarily serves small entrepreneurs like Wilson who do not have enough collateral for commercial loans, but have businesses that have grown too large for microloans.

loans.use: to purchase more electrical items like wire cables, main switches and wiring gadgets

loans.name: Mwanamvua

texts.en:
Mwanamvua is a happily married 32-year-old woman living in the town of Msambweni with her husband and six children who she loves and who are her main reason for working. She’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who, together with her husband, focuses all efforts on moving their family forward. 

On her own initiative and with much effort and enthusiasm, Mwanamvua started a small food stall. She starts working every day very early in the morning and spends about 14 hours per day at work. She believes she does well because of her dedication and because of the good customer service she provides.

Mwanamvua is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided, she will be able to buy ingredents like baking flour, beans, rice, among others so that her stall will be well-stocked. She hopes to increase sales and income this way so she can use the proceeds to insure her children’s education and well-being since she dreams of them becoming professionals and upstanding citizens.

loans.use: to buy ingredents like baking flour, beans, and rice, among others

loans.name: Qurbonboy

texts.ru: Курбонбой житель города Куляб. Ему 27 лет. Он женат. У него один ребенок. Курбонбой имеет высшее неоконченное образование. На протяжении трех лет он работает таксистом. Он в основном развозит пассажиров по маршруту Душанбе-Куляб. Курбонбой просит кредит для ремонта своего автомобиля.
texts.en: Qurbonboy is a resident of the city of Kulob.  He is 27 years old, married and has one child.  Qurbonboy has an unfinished higher education.  He has been working as a taxi driver for three years.  He primarily transports passengers along the Dushanbe-Kulob route.  Qurbonboy is requesting this loan to repair his car.

loans.use: to repair his Opel passenger vehicle

loans.name: Sanat

texts.ru: Санъат веселая, трудолюбивая женщина.  Она более два года открыла свое дело,ее вид деятельности заключается в том что она занимается торговлей женской одежды.   Дети растут и семейные расходы тоже растут.    Муж работает частными работами и тоже зарабатывает стабильно.    У Санъат трое детей и они уже большие.    Старший сын окончил школу и работает мастером по ремонты домов и квартир.   По рекомендации коллег по работе Санъат обратилась в нашу организацию за кредитом и получила свой первый  небольшой кредит на расширение.  Справилась с первым кредитом отлично и с уверенностью берет второй кредит.     На полученный кредит она  хочет закупить женскую одежду и школьную форму для девочек.
texts.en: Sanat is a cheerful and hardworking woman.  She started her own business two years ago and is involved in selling women's clothing.  Her children are growing and so do the family's expenses.  Her husband does private contract work and also earns a stable income.  Sanat has three children, all of whom are already grown.  Her oldest son finished school and works as a house and apartment repairman.  Through her colleagues' recommendation, Sanat came to our organization for a loan and obtained her first small loan for business expansion.  She handled her first loan with excellence and is confidently requesting a second one.  She wants to use this loan to purchase women's clothing and school uniforms for girls.

loans.use: to purchase women's clothing and school uniforms for girls

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies to grow vegetables.

loans.name: Cornelio Cipriano

texts.es:
Cornelio Sipriano tiene 49 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene 4 hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos vive en el cantón ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC LAS PALMAS, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto campo Alegre, Pertenece al Cantón Bab se dedican a labores Agrícolas.

Cornelio se dedica al agricultura a la siembra de arroz, maíz hace 22 años, Las compras y las ventas lo realiza en Pueblo viejo.

Solicita el crédito para seguir trabajando en la siembra de maíz y arroz. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar sin ningún tipo de problema los insumos. El sueño es poder hacer un mejoramiento en la vivienda, No se le ha presentado ningún tipo de problemas. En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
